SA01vakobhau:017_24-26_0: ye 'pyanye skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ sūtrāntareṣūktāste 'pyeṣveva yathokteṣu skandhādiṣu pratiopādyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathāvihitamasmiṃacchāstre saṃpradharya /
SA01vakobhau:017_26-02_0: tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:018_10-11_0: ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam /
SA01vakobhau:018_11-12_0: tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ/
SA01vakobhau:018_19_0: aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare /
SA01vakobhau:018_24-25_0: tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti /
SA01vakobhau:018_26_0: ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:019_06_0: ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:019_06-07_0: pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:019_08_0: yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā /
SA01vakobhau:019_09-10_0: yathoktaṃ prajñaptā"vasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale /
SA01vakobhau:019_16-17_0: yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:019_17-18_0: kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:019_18-19_0: nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
SA01vakobhau:019_20-21_0: ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
SA01vakobhau:019_21_0: prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:019_23-24_0: ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti /
SA01vakobhau:021_01-02_0: tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:021_03-04_0: ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti /
SA01vakobhau:021_05-06_0: tābhyāṃ hi vinā'; śrayaśobhaiva na syāditi vyavahārśca /
SA01vakobhau:021_06-07_0: yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam /
SA01vakobhau:021_16_0: yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:021_17-18_0: sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau /
SA01vakobhau:021_18_0: ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena /
SA01vakobhau:021_21-22_0: rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:022_02_0: kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:022_06-08_0: tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:022_11_0: kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:022_17_0: daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt //
SA01vakobhau:022_18_0: yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_1.33_0: tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī //
SA01vakobhau:022_26_0: mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:023_02-03_0: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:023_05-06_0: śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham /
SA01vakobhau:023_09_1: ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham /
SA01vakobhau:023_15-16_0: anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:024_01-02_0: tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:024_02-03_0: na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:024_03-05_0: uktaṃ ca sūtre "cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ
SA01vakobhau:024_05-06_0: rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
SA01vakobhau:024_06-07_0: śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
SA01vakobhau:024_07-08_0: spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:024_09_0: spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam /
SA01vakobhau:024_09-10_0: yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ "yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatami"ti
SA01vakobhau:024_12-13_0: na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum /
SA01vakobhau:024_13-14_0: "saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita';
SA01vakobhau:024_18-19_0: paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati //
SA01vakobhau:024_20-21_0: aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate /
SA01vakobhau:024_22_0: chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:024_26-27_0: yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:025_04_0: kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:025_06-07_0: kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:025_09-10_0: adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:025_13_0: bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:025_20-21_0: yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ "pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti /
SA01vakobhau:025_22_0: karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:025_22-24_0: karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti /
SA01vakobhau:025_24-25_0: evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti /
SA01vakobhau:026_03-04_0: te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api /
SA01vakobhau:026_08-09_0: te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_1.38_0: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca //
SA01vakobhau:026_22-23_0: tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan /
SA01vakobhau:026_25_0: etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti /
SA01vakobhau:027_05_0: ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:027_10_0: "cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham" iti /
SA01vakobhau:027_12-13_0: evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:027_13-14_0: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante /
SA01vakobhau:027_15-16_0: yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta /
SA01vakobhau:027_21-22_0: yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:027_22-23_0: na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā /
SA01vakobhau:027_23-24_0: tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate "sarvadharmā anātmāna" iti /
SA01vakobhau:027_25-26_0: sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:028_02_0: uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:028_02-03_0: tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:028_04-05_0: yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi /
SA01vakobhau:028_06_0: tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:028_07-08_0: rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni /
SA01vakobhau:028_09_0: yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi /
SA01vakobhau:028_11-12_0: rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam /
SA01vakobhau:028_12-13_0: asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu /
SA01vakobhau:028_13-14_0: natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām /
SA01vakobhau:028_16-18_0: gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:028_18-19_0: asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi /
SA01vakobhau:028_23-24_0: ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:028_25_0: kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:029_02-03_0: nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma /
SA01vakobhau:029_11-12_0: tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam //
SA01vakobhau:029_13_0: aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:029_17-18_0: pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:030_01_1: ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:030_06_0: savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti /
SA01vakobhau:030_06-07_0: evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu /
SA01vakobhau:030_12_0: yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:030_12-13_0: yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet /
SA01vakobhau:030_13-14_0: naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:030_14-16_0: yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:030_16-17_0: kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet /
SA01vakobhau:030_19-20_0: yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:030_20-21_0: yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:030_24-25_0: yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ "cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:030_25-27_0: uktaṃ ca sūtre "cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya" ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:031_01_0: yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:031_01-02_0: yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti /
SA01vakobhau:031_02-03_0: tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi /
SA01vakobhau:031_03-04_0: "yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriye"ti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:031_09_0: tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam /
SA01vakobhau:031_13_1: tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:031_15-16_0: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā "janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvedi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:031_17-18_0: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti /
SA01vakobhau:031_19_0: tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām /
SA01vakobhau:031_22-23_0: tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:031_23-24_0: ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:031_24-25_0: na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi /
SA01vakobhau:031_26-27_0: yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:032_02_0: tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:032_02-03_0: sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:032_03-04_0: yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:032_05-06_0: kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:032_06-07_0: yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:032_15-16_0: ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale /
SA01vakobhau:032_17-18_0: kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:032_20-21_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām /
SA01vakobhau:032_21-22_0: kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāha"kāraṇaṃ prati /
SA01vakobhau:033_01_0: kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:033_04_0: anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta /
SA01vakobhau:033_05-06_0: ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante /
SA01vakobhau:033_06-07_0: yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:033_12_0: yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti /
SA01vakobhau:033_14-15_0: kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa /
SA01vakobhau:033_24_0: tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:034_03-04_0: ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:034_09-10_0: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:034_10_0: atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:034_17-18_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:034_20-21_0: cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:034_22_0: tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:034_23-24_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:034_29_0: tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:035_01-02_0: atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi /
SA01vakobhau:035_03_0: kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:035_04-05_0: tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni /
SA01vakobhau:035_06-07_0: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:035_07-06_0: prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:035_08-10_0: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam /
SA01vakobhau:035_10-11_0: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:035_11-12_0: prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ /
SA01vakobhau:035_12-13_0: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:035_13-14_0: kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:035_16-17_0: dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:035_20-21_0: tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:035_21-22_0: yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:035_24_0: na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_1.46_0: asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //
SA01vakobhau:036_02_0: asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca /
SA01vakobhau:036_05-06_0: "na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotramūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:036_05-06_1: vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdastu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //"iti
SA01vakobhau:036_12_0: kāyaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ ca svabhūmikānyeva nityaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:036_16-17_0: kadācit kāyamanovijñānadharmaiḥ samānabhūmikaṃ mano bhavati kadācidūrdhvādhobhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:036_17-19_0: pañcabhūmike 'pi hi kāye sarvabhūmikāni mana ādīni bhavanti samāpattyupapattikāle yathāyogamiti vistareṇa samāpattinirdeśe kośasthāna etadākhyāyiṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:036_20_0: alpaṃ ca prayojanaṃ mahāṃśca śrama iti samāpta ānuṣaṅgikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:036_21-22_0: aṣṭādaśānāṃ cdātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kaḥ kena vijñeyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:036_25_0: evamete pratyekaṃ dvābhyāṃ vijñānābhyāṃ vijñeyā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:036_26-27_0: śeṣāstrayodaśa dhātavaḥ pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāmaviṣayatvādekena manovijñānena vijñeyā ityākhyātaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:037_01_0: eṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ madhye kati nityāḥ katyanityāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:037_01-02_0: na kaśct sakalo 'sti nityo dhāturapi tu
SA01vakobhau:037_07-11_0: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendraiyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smādhīndriyaṃ prajñendariyaṃ anājñātamājñāsyāmīndariyam ājñendriyaṃ ājñātāvīndriyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:037_12-13_0: tatra dharmārdhaṃ jīvitendriyādīnyekādaśendriyāṇi trayāṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmadhātupradeśatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:037_14-15_0: sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyaṃ stripuruṣendriye kāyadhātupradeś iti paścād vakṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:037_15-16_0: śeṣāḥ pañca dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca nendriyamiti siddham //
SA01vakobhau:037_19-21_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhau:037_19-21_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirhodha evaṃvādīu mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:038_17-18_0: tathā hi tadviprayuktavikalpānāṃ ṣaṇḍha paṇḍakobhayavyañjanānāmasaṃvarānantāryakuāśalamulasamucchedā na bhavanti saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti /
SA01vakobhau:038_20-22_0: tatra punrbhavasaṃbandhe yathoktaṃ "gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataracittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ ve"ti /
SA01vakobhau:038_22_0: vaśibhāvānuvarttane yathoktaṃ "cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:038_22-23_0: yat punaḥ sukhādīndriyapañcakaṃ yāni cāṣṭau śraddhādīni teṣāṃ
SA01vakobhau:039_14-15_0: kaścidasau kāyendriyabhāga upastha pradeśo yaḥ strīpuruṣendriyākhyāṃ paratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:039_20-21_0: tathāhi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete duḥkhāyāṃ pratigho 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyetyuktaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:040_14-16_0: tasya strīpuruṣavikalpaḥ strīpuruṣendraiyābhyāṃ sthitirjīvitendriyeṇa saṃkleśo vedanā bhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:040_23-24_0: ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prabhavaḥ sthitirājñendriyam upabhoga ājñātāvīndriyeṇetyata etāvantyevendriyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:040_26-27_0: tadeva hi tadanyathā 'nyatra cotpannamādānaṃ viharaṇaṃ cocyate /
SA01vakobhau:041_01_0: upasthasyāpi nendriyatvamānande strīpuruṣendriyakṛtaṃ hi tat saukhyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:041_03-04_0: sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya svasyāṃ kariyāyāmityayukataṃ vāgādīnāmindriyatvam //
SA01vakobhau:vakk_2.7_0: dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam //
SA01vakobhau:041_14_0: tṛtīye tu dhyāne saiva śātā vedanā caitasī sukhendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:041_17-18_0: tṛtīyāddhyānādanyatra kāmadhātau prathame dvitīye ca dhyāne sā caiatasikī śātā vedanā saumanasyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:041_18-19_0: tṛtīye tu dhyāne prītivītarāgatvāt sukhendriyameva sā na saumanasyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:042_02_0: caitasikaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhaṃ prāyeṇa vikalpanādutpadyate na tu kāyikam /
SA01vakobhau:042_03-04_0: upekṣā tu svarasenāvikalpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī ce tyekamindriyam kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:042_05-06_0: upekṣāyāṃ tveṣa vikalpo nāstyata upekṣaṇaṃ pratyavikalpanādabhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:042_09-10_0: darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:042_14_0: "duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyamiti" tathābhūtasyenriyamājñātāvīnriyam /
SA01vakobhau:042_15-16_0: svabhāvanirdeśāṃ kṛtvā prakārabhedo vaktavya kati sāsravāṇi katyanāsravāṇi inriyāṇityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:042_24-25_0: manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ śraddhādīni ca pañca etāni navendriyāṇi sāsravāṇyanāsravāṇyapi /
SA01vakobhau:042_25-27_0: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā "yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa srvaṃ na santi tamahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:043_02-04_0: uktaṃ ca sūtre "santi ca sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhāstīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apī" tyapravarttita eva dharmacakre /
SA01vakobhau:043_05-07_0: punaścoktaṃ "yāvacchāhameṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samudayaṃ cāstagamaṃ ca svādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ nādhyajñāsiṣaṃ na tāvadahamasmātsadevakāllokādi"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:043_10_0: atha yadarhan bhikṣurāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati tajjīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:043_11-13_0: arhan bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśitvaṃ prāptaḥ saṃghāya va pudgalāya vā pātraḥ vā cīvaraṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ vā dattvā tat praṇidhāya prantakoṭikam caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:043_14-15_0: sa tasmāt vyutthāya cittamutpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate yanme bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavatviti /
SA01vakobhau:043_18_0: tathaīva dānaṃ dattvā praṇidhāya prantakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate/
SA01vakobhau:043_19_0: yanme āyurvipākaṃ tat bhogavipākaṃ bhavatviti tasya tathā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:043_20-21_0: tasminneva āśraye rūpāvacarāṇi mahābhūtāni dhyānabalena saṃmudhakarotyāyuṣo 'nukūlāni vaihodhikāni ca /
SA01vakobhau:043_22-24_0: samādhiprabhāva eva sa teṣāṃ tadṛśo yena pūrvakarmajaṃ ca sthitikālāvedhamindriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvrttayantyapūrvaṃ ca samādhijamāvedhamākṣipanti /
SA01vakobhau:044_01_0: alpaṃ ca parahitaṃ jīvite paśyanti rogābhibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam /
SA01vakobhau:044_04_1: athaitadāyuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthāpanārthamutsarjanaṃ vā kva kasya vā veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:044_10-11_0: yaistu kālāntaraṃ jīvati te jīvitasaṃskārā iti /
SA01vakobhau:044_17-18_0: yaccāpi tat pratijñātam "evaṃbhāvitairahaṃ caturbhirṛddhi pādairākāṅkṣankalpamapi tiṣṭheyaṃ kalpāvaśeṣamapī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:045_03-04_0: jīvitendriyaṃ cakṣurādīni dvādaśa hitvā śeṣāṇyavipāka iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:045_04-05_0: yadi dauarmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka iti sūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate "trīṇi kāryāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:045_05-06_0: saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma upekṣā vedanīyaṃ karme"ti saṃprayogavedanīyatāmadhikṛtyoktam /
SA01vakobhau:045_07-08_0: saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye api tarhi karmaṇī evaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:045_08-09_0: saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ vipāke 'pi na doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:045_09-10_0: kā punratra yuktirdaurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti /
SA01vakobhau:045_10_0: daurmanasyaṃ hi parikalpaviśeṣairutpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca /
SA01vakobhau:045_11-12_0: yadi tarhi daumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syādānantaryakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ daurmanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:045_13-14_0: yadi saumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syāt puṇyakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ saumanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:045_16_0: sati tu saṃbhave saumanasyasyāsti vipākāvakāśī na dauarmanasyasya /
SA01vakobhau:045_16-17_0: sarvathā 'samudācārāditi nāstyevaṃ daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:045_17-18_0: tatra jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya vipāko durgatāvakuśalasya /
SA01vakobhau:046_03-04_0: tatra manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣā akuāśalāḥ kuśalāḥ sāsravāśca savipākāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:046_23-24_0: tatra maithunadharmavairāgyādaśobhākaratvācca rūpadhātau strīpuruṣendriye na staḥ /
SA01vakobhau:046_26-27_0: anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo yaḥ kāmachātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:048_08-09_0: sūtre 'pyuktaṃ "ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:048_09_0: tatra rūpadhātau ṣaḍḍindriyāṇi vipākaḥ parathamato labhyante /
SA01vakobhau:048_13_0: tasmin ekameva jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ prathamato labhyate nānyat /
SA01vakobhau:048_18-19_0: sarve hyupapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ca /
SA01vakobhau:048_25_1: eṣa ca nyāyaḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:048_26_0: yadā tu kuśale cetasi sthito mriyate tadā
SA01vakobhau:049_02_0: kuśale cetasi mriyamāṇaḥ sarvatra yathoktamindriyāṇi nirodhayati /
SA01vakobhau:049_03-04_0: evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau nirodhayati rūpeṣu trayodaśāeti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam /
SA01vakobhau:049_16-17_0: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvadyadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:049_18-19_0: atha bhūyovītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiryeneva srota āpattiphalasya /
SA01vakobhau:049_19-20_0: anāgāmiphalaṃ yadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:049_24-26_0: yadāpyayamānupūrviko navame vimūktimārge tīkṣṇenriyatvā ddhyānaṃ praviśāti laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpyaṣṭābhirindriyairanāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:049_26-27_0: bhavatyānantaryamārge tūpekṣendriyameva nityamubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:049_27-28_0: atha lokottareṇa praviśāti tasya navabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:050_04-05_0: asti saṃbhavo yadekaḥ pudgalaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyīpekṣābhirarhattvaṃ prāpnuyādata ekādaśabhirityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:050_06-07_0: nahyasau parihīṇaḥ kadācitsukhendriyeṇa prāpnnoti na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:050_09_1: katamenendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ katibhiḥ avaśyaṃ samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:050_12-13_0: ya eṣāmupekṣādīnāmanyatamena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ tribhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyebhireva /
SA01vakobhau:050_24-25_0: yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca /
SA01vakobhau:050_25_0: yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca /
SA01vakobhau:051_12_0: yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca /
SA01vakobhau:051_23_0: atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:052_01_0: vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā /
SA01vakobhau:052_09_0: atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:052_19-20_0: kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti /
SA01vakobhau:052_21_0: rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:052_24_0: sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte /
SA01vakobhau:052_24-25_0: sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ/
SA01vakobhau:052_25-01_0: aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni /
SA01vakobhau:053_01-02_0: sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā /
SA01vakobhau:053_06_0: aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:053_07-08_0: saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:053_09-10_0: kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā /
SA01vakobhau:053_10-11_0: yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:053_12-13_0: pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:053_14-15_0: bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:053_17-18_0: rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante /
SA01vakobhau:053_19_0: kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:053_19-20_0: yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:053_23-24_0: caturdravyako hi vaktavyo yāvatā bhūtānyapi spraṣṭavyāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:053_24-25_0: kiñcidatra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśrayabhūtaṃ kiñcidatrāyatanaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśritabhūtam /
SA01vakobhau:053_25-26_0: evamapi bhūyāṃsi bhūtadravyāṇi bhavantyupādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:054_07-08_0: yatkiṃ cidutpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā viprayuktā vā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:054_10-410_0: prāptyā saha satvākhyamevotpadyate nānyaditi vikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:054_13-14_0: pañca prakārāścaittā mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ akuśalamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:054_14-15_0: yo hi yasya gativiśayaḥ sa tasya bhūmirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:054_15-16_0: tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_2.24_0: vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:054_19_0: ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:054_24-25_0: sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:054_25-02_0: rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:055_02-03_0: kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_2.25_1: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā //
SA01vakobhau:055_06_0: ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:055_10_0: sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā /
SA01vakobhau:055_13-14_0: tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:055_16-17_0: naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete /
SA01vakobhau:055_24-25_0: prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate /
SA01vakobhau:056_02-03_0: kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:056_03_0: ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:056_12-13_0: "āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce" ti /
SA01vakobhau:056_18-19_0: ata evocyate "ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:056_19_1: prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca /
SA01vakobhau:056_22-23_0: styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:056_23-24_0: evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam /
SA01vakobhau:056_25-26_0: kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:056_28_0: ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra //
SA01vakobhau:057_02-03_0: akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:057_06-07_0: parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:057_09_0: tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:057_15_1: daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:057_17-18_0: yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:057_19_0: iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:057_19-21_0: tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti /
SA01vakobhau:057_21-22_0: loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:058_01_0: na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
SA01vakobhau:058_05-06_0: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:058_06-07_0: āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:058_09-10_0: tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā /
SA01vakobhau:058_12-13_0: yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:058_14-15_0: krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:058_16_0: samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:058_20_0: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca /
SA01vakobhau:059_02_0: ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ
SA01vakobhau:059_04_0: ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam /
SA01vakobhau:059_06_0: ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva
SA01vakobhau:059_10-11_0: dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:059_12-13_0: sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ "kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante" iti /
SA01vakobhau:059_14-15_0: "ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:059_16_0: idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:059_19-20_0: guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:059_23-24_0: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam /
SA01vakobhau:059_24-25_0: abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate /
SA01vakobhau:060_01_0: evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:060_01-03_0: na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam /
SA01vakobhau:060_04-05_0: pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ /
SA01vakobhau:060_12-13_0: pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu /
SA01vakobhau:060_20-21_0: nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete /
SA01vakobhau:060_21_0: dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:060_21-22_0: tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ /
SA01vakobhau:060_26-01_0: yathā 'pyasuniṣṭhyūtaṃ sarpiḥ sūryaraśmibhirūpariṣṭātspṛṣṭaṃ nātiśyāyate nātivilīyate evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:061_01-03_0: evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau /
SA01vakobhau:061_06-07_0: tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:061_07-08_0: yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:061_11-12_0: naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_2.33_1: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:061_17_0: yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:061_20_0: uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:062_05_1: ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:062_09-10_0: yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti /
SA01vakobhau:062_14_0: ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante /
SA01vakobhau:062_17_0: dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:062_24-25_0: ata eva hi cottamabhidharme "anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:062_26-01_0: pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:063_02-03_0: yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:063_04-05_0: sūtre hyustaṃ "sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:063_06_0: tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /
SA01vakobhau:063_07_1: "rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:063_08_1: tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti /
SA01vakobhau:063_10-11_0: ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat /
SA01vakobhau:063_12-13_0: ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:063_14-15_0: sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:063_15_0: yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:063_17-18_0: asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:063_19-20_0: etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:063_21-22_0: āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:063_24-25_0: yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:063_25-26_0: kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti /
SA01vakobhau:063_26-27_0: tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:064_01-02_0: na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:064_03-05_0: tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam /
SA01vakobhau:064_05-06_0: yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā /
SA01vakobhau:064_09-10_0: yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum /
SA01vakobhau:064_10-11_0: evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:064_23-24_0: tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca /
SA01vakobhau:065_03_0: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:065_05-06_0: tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī /
SA01vakobhau:065_09-10_1: teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya /
SA01vakobhau:065_18_0: dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:065_18-19_0: teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:065_25-26_0: yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti /
SA01vakobhau:066_13-14_0: anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:066_23-24_0: yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca /
SA01vakobhau:067_01-02_0: tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:067_02-03_0: prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā /
SA01vakobhau:067_03-04_0: evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:067_04-05_0: tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:067_05-06_0: tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:067_06-10_0: evamuttarottaravāṛddhiprasaṇṅgenaitāḥ praptayo visarpantyaḥ sarveṣāmatītānāgatānāṃ kleśopakleśakṣaṇānāmupapattilābhikānāṃ ca kuśalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃprayoga sahabhuvāmanādyantasaṃsāraparyāpannānāmanantā ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ sattvānāṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:067_11-12_0: itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:067_15_1: sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā /
SA01vakobhau:067_17-18_0: bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā /
SA01vakobhau:067_18-20_0: punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca /
SA01vakobhau:067_21_0: syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti /
SA01vakobhau:067_25_0: yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena /
SA01vakobhau:067_26-02_0: naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:068_03-04_0: śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:068_06-07_0: sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā /
SA01vakobhau:068_07-08_0: astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:068_08-09_0: ustaṃ hi bhagavatā "sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:068_09-10_0: ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat /
SA01vakobhau:068_15-17_0: asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante /
SA01vakobhau:068_21_0: bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat /
SA01vakobhau:068_23-24_0: "prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt cyutirbhavatī"ti sūtre pāthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:068_24-25_0: te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:068_25-26_0: pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti /
SA01vakobhau:068_26-27_0: yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:068_28_0: atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī /
SA01vakobhau:069_12-13_0: yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:069_22-23_0: labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna tyajati /
SA01vakobhau:070_12-13_0: aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:070_13-14_0: yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:070_16-17_0: nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:070_23-24_0: kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma /
SA01vakobhau:070_25-26_0: kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati /
SA01vakobhau:070_27-01_0: sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:071_01-02_0: evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:071_05_0: nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:071_07-09_0: satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt /
SA01vakobhau:071_13-14_0: kathaṃ tarhi "na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:071_18_0: ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete /
SA01vakobhau:071_18-19_0: ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:071_20-22_0: syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava" iti /
SA01vakobhau:072_02-05_0: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:072_05-06_0: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:072_06-07_0: atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:072_19-20_0: kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:072_21-22_0: kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:072_22_0: cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt /
SA01vakobhau:072_22-23_0: evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt /
SA01vakobhau:072_23-24_0: anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:072_24-25_0: bhadantavasumitrastvāha paripṛcchāyāṃ "yasyācittikā nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiri"ti /
SA01vakobhau:072_27-28_0: sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:073_01-02_0: satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti /
SA01vakobhau:073_02-03_0: avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat /
SA01vakobhau:073_05-06_0: samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:073_06_0: kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:073_08-09_0: samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:073_09-11_0: yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:073_12-13_0: cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:073_16-17_0: etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti /
SA01vakobhau:073_22_0: tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:073_23-24_0: evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:073_27_0: ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya /
SA01vakobhau:073_28-074_01_0: na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti /
SA01vakobhau:074_05-06_0: yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:074_07-08_0: yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:074_08-09_0: tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca /
SA01vakobhau:074_16-17_0: kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:074_19-20_0: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:074_20-21_0: samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vaktavyam" /
SA01vakobhau:074_22-23_0: yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam /
SA01vakobhau:074_26-27_0: ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:074_27-28_0: teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā/
SA01vakobhau:075_02-06_0: nobhayaṃ sarveṣā mantarābhavikāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāmanekajātīyānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tadyathā nārakāṇā muttarakauravāṇāṃ darśanamārgamaitrīnirodhāsaṃjñi samāpattisamāpannānāṃ rājarṣijinadūtajinādiṣṭa dharmilo ttaragaṅgila śreṣṭhiputrayaśaḥ dumārajīvakādīnāṃ sarveṣā caramabhavikānāṃvodhisattva mātustadgarbhāyāḥ cakravarttinaścakravarttimātuśca tadgarbhāyāḥ/
SA01vakobhau:075_06-07_0: atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā /
SA01vakobhau:075_08-09_0: anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:075_09-10_0: nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:075_13-14_0: ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:075_14-15_0: eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:075_16_0: yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:075_16-17_0: santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti /
SA01vakobhau:075_20-21_0: yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:075_21-22_0: tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati /
SA01vakobhau:075_24-25_0: jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti /
SA01vakobhau:075_25-01_0: ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:076_03_0: tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:076_03-04_0: tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi /
SA01vakobhau:076_06-07_0: anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:076_08-09_0: eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti /
SA01vakobhau:076_17_0: jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:076_19-20_0: tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni /
SA01vakobhau:076_20-21_0: tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim /
SA01vakobhau:076_23-24_0: nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante /
SA01vakobhau:076_24-25_0: nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:076_26-27_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapī" ti /
SA01vakobhau:076_28-29_0: avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante /
SA01vakobhau:076_29-02_0: tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha "triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni" /
SA01vakobhau:077_04-05_0: punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta /
SA01vakobhau:077_05-06_0: maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi /
SA01vakobhau:077_08-09_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ "viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:077_15-16_0: "kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:077_15-16_1: na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā //"
SA01vakobhau:077_19_0: yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam "ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:077_21-22_0: pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi dravyāntarakalpanayā /
SA01vakobhau:077_26-27_0: nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:077_27-29_0: antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:078_01-02_0: ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:078_02-04_0: samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā "saṃskṛtaṃ nāma yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ so 'nyathā cānyathā ca bhavatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:078_04-05_0: kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:078_05-08_0: kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnā-lāṅgūla-kakuda-śapha-viṣāṇādīni ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:078_08-09_0: yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat /
SA01vakobhau:078_09-10_0: naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:078_10-11_0: gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:078_11-12_0: tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante /
SA01vakobhau:078_13-14_0: eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt /
SA01vakobhau:078_14_1: anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:078_14-16_0: yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā /
SA01vakobhau:078_16-17_0: kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet /
SA01vakobhau:078_17-18_0: satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:078_18-20_0: uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:078_20-21_0: sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:078_21-22_0: yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:078_22-24_0: kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate /
SA01vakobhau:078_24_0: athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:078_25-26_0: evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:078_29_0: śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum /
SA01vakobhau:079_01-02_0: yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām /
SA01vakobhau:079_02-04_0: nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:079_04-05_0: sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat /
SA01vakobhau:079_05-06_0: sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:079_07_0: jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā /
SA01vakobhau:079_11-12_0: yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo "vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatī"ti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:079_12-15_0: tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā vināśakāraṇānapekṣatvāt sthityanityate kāritramabhinnakālaṃ kuryātāmityekasyaikatra kāle sthita vinaṣṭatā saṃprasajyeta /
SA01vakobhau:079_15-16_0: tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:079_17_0: apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:079_20-21_0: sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:079_22-23_0: jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti /
SA01vakobhau:079_24_0: tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhi-siddhyartham /
SA01vakobhau:080_01-02_0: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti /
SA01vakobhau:080_04_0: yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:080_05-06_0: yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:080_06-08_0: yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:080_08_0: siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:080_09-10_0: nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:080_15-16_0: vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā "anityā vata saṃskārā" ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante /
SA01vakobhau:080_17-18_0: na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:080_22-23_0: padakāyaḥ tadyathā "sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami" tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:080_23-24_0: vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:080_24-25_0: nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:080_25-26_0: ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante /
SA01vakobhau:080_26-28_0: vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk /
SA01vakobhau:081_04-05_0: yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:081_05-06_0: taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:081_06_0: idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti /
SA01vakobhau:081_07-09_0: ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:081_09-11_0: ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:081_12_0: na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet /
SA01vakobhau:081_13-14_0: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta /
SA01vakobhau:081_14-15_0: athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti /
SA01vakobhau:081_15-16_0: atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:081_16_0: eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:081_16-18_0: vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:081_19_0: evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād /
SA01vakobhau:081_19-21_0: apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam /
SA01vakobhau:081_24-25_0: atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:081_27-28_0: santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:082_01-02_0: atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:082_04_1: ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:082_05_1: yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate /
SA01vakobhau:082_06-07_0: yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /
SA01vakobhau:082_19-20_0: yaktūktaṃ "janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā" iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:082_23-24_0: kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti /
SA01vakobhau:082_26_0: saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:082_27-02_0: nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti jñānameṣāṃ vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtasya kāraṇaheturbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:083_03-04_0: tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti /
SA01vakobhau:083_04-06_0: yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau /
SA01vakobhau:083_06-07_0: asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:083_07-08_0: asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:083_08-09_0: yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:083_10-11_0: yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:083_12_0: yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti /
SA01vakobhau:083_14-16_0: tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:083_19_0: mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /
SA01vakobhau:083_22-23_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam /
SA01vakobhau:083_23-24_0: vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam //
SA01vakobhau:083_26_0: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
SA01vakobhau:084_11-13_0: satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:084_13-15_0: ye tarhi "tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi" tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:084_16-19_0: anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:084_20-21_0: kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:084_22-24_0: saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti /
SA01vakobhau:084_25-26_0: yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti /
SA01vakobhau:084_26-01_0: sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:085_02-03_0: atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:085_04-06_0: kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā /
SA01vakobhau:085_06-07_0: eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:085_10-11_0: sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām /
SA01vakobhau:085_14-15_0: bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam /
SA01vakobhau:085_15-16_0: ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate "atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati" riti /
SA01vakobhau:085_19_0: svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:085_22-24_0: te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām /
SA01vakobhau:085_27-02_0: pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:086_03-04_0: idapi śāstraṃ "yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:086_05-06_0: yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ "na kadācinna heturi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:086_06-08_0: tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:086_08-10_0: ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi /
SA01vakobhau:086_10-11_0: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:086_11-12_0: evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta /
SA01vakobhau:086_13-15_0: yattarhīdamuktam "anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu sthāpitaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeśca heturi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:086_15-16_0: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:086_16-18_0: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:086_19-20_0: nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam /
SA01vakobhau:086_21-22_0: kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:086_26-27_0: vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:087_04_0: yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:087_06-07_0: anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:087_07-08_0: āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:087_11-12_0: tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya /
SA01vakobhau:087_16-17_0: kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā /
SA01vakobhau:087_20_0: kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:087_25-26_0: ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām /
SA01vakobhau:087_29-01_0: teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_01-02_0: upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_03-04_0: te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam /
SA01vakobhau:088_06-07_0: tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti /
SA01vakobhau:088_07-08_0: ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām/
SA01vakobhau:088_08-09_0: sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_10-11_0: syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_11-12_0: syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_12-14_0: tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:088_17-18_0: evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām /
SA01vakobhau:088_20_0: samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_20-22_0: samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:088_26-27_0: ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:089_03_0: svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:089_05-06_0: nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante /
SA01vakobhau:089_07-08_0: sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:089_09_0: kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti /
SA01vakobhau:089_10-13_0: duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatya"miti /
SA01vakobhau:089_13_0: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "syāddharmo 'kuśalo 'kuśalahetuka eva /
SA01vakobhau:089_14-15_0: syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:089_23-24_0: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:089_24-25_0: yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ "vīpākajaṃ cakṣuri"ti etanna prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:089_25-26_0: atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ "karmaṇo vipāka" ityetanna prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:090_07-08_0: dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:090_11-12_0: asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:090_12_0: yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane /
SA01vakobhau:090_12-13_0: evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni /
SA01vakobhau:090_15-16_0: asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:090_19-20_0: na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti /
SA01vakobhau:090_21-22_0: na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya /
SA01vakobhau:090_23-24_0: ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate /
SA01vakobhau:091_02-04_0: evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:091_07-08_0: yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat /
SA01vakobhau:091_08_0: kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam /
SA01vakobhau:091_17_0: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam bhaviṣyati"
SA01vakobhau:091_21_0: ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti /
SA01vakobhau:091_21-23_0: nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:091_23-24_0: ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtre na tvanāvaraṇaheturiti na sūtre sidhyatyasaṃskṛtasya hetubhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:091_24-25_0: sūtrāṇi ca bahūnyantarhitānīti kathametannirdhāryate nokta iti /
SA01vakobhau:091_27-01_0: tadānīṃ "pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamo yo visaṃyoga" ityuktamidānīṃ isaṃyogaḥkathamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:092_03_0: etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram /
SA01vakobhau:092_10-11_0: yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:092_12_0: so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau /
SA01vakobhau:092_12-13_0: ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:092_15-16_0: na vai sa pratisaṃkhyāpūrvako nahi poūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyā paścādanutpannānāmanutpādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:092_17-18_0: vinā tu pratisaṃkhyayā ye dharmā utpatsyante tadutpannāyāṃ pratisaṃkhyāyāṃ punarnopapadyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:092_19-21_0: yadi narhi anutpāda eva nirvāṇamidaṃ sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "pañcemānīndriyāṇi āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulīkṛtānyatītānāgatapratyūtpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvarttanta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:092_22-24_0: kiṃ tu tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt duḥkhasya prahāṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā "yo rūpe cchandarāgastaṃ prajahīta /
SA01vakobhau:092_24-25_0: cchandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vastadrūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pārijñātaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:092_27-29_0: athavā 'yamabhiprāyo bhavedatītaḥ kleśaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ pratyutpannaḥ kleśa aihajanmiko yathā tṛṣṇā vicariteṣvaṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritānyatītamadhvānamupādāyetyatītaṃ janmādhikṛtyoktamevaṃ yāvat pratyutpannam /
SA01vakobhau:092_29-01_0: tenā ca kleśadvayenāsyāṃ santatau bījabhāva āhito 'nāgatasyotpattaye /
SA01vakobhau:093_02-03_0: anāgatasya punarduḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījābhāvāt atyantamanutpādaḥ prahāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:093_04_0: nahi niruddhe nirodhābhimukhe ca yatnaḥ sārthako bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:093_04-06_0: yadyasaṃskṛṭaṃ nāstyeva, yaduktaṃ bhagavatā "ye keciddharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā 'saṃskṛtā vā virāgasteṣāmagra ākhyāyate" iti kathamasatāmasannagro bhavitumarhati /
SA01vakobhau:093_07-08_0: tadyathā asti śabdasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:093_09-10_0: abhāvo 'pi ca kaścit praśasyatamo bhavati yaḥ sakalasyopadravasyātyantamabhāva ityanyeṣāṃ so 'gra iti praśaṃsāṃ labdhumarhati /
SA01vakobhau:093_12-14_0: ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:093_14-15_0: ustaṃ yathāryasatyaṃ dvitīyasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭamuddṛṣṭaṃ ceti tṛtīyaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:093_18-19_0: devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate /
SA01vakobhau:093_19-20_0: nahi tasya rūpavedanādivat svabhāva upalabhyate nacāpi cakṣurādivatkarma /
SA01vakobhau:093_20-21_0: amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:093_21-22_0: nahi tasya tena sārdhaṃ kaścitsaṃbandho hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt /
SA01vakobhau:093_22-23_0: bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa tasyeti vyavadiśyate /
SA01vakobhau:093_27-01_0: "yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati sandhiranutpādo 'prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:094_01-02_0: etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa" miti /
SA01vakobhau:094_04-05_0: nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:094_05-06_0: atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:094_06-07_0: ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:094_09_0: yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti /
SA01vakobhau:094_11-12_0: svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ "yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastune"ti /
SA01vakobhau:094_13-14_0: yathoktaṃ "yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:094_17_0: tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti /
SA01vakobhau:094_18_0: athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:094_23-24_0: etadeva aṅgībhāvo 'pi cāsti kāraṇahetostadyathā "pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣudaśānāmāyatanānāṃ bhājanaloke ca karmaṇām /
SA01vakobhau:095_06-07_0: yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:095_09_0: kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam /
SA01vakobhau:095_15-16_0: tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:095_21-22_0: yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:095_22-23_0: yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:095_23-24_0: yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:095_24-25_0: atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:096_04-05_0: tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:096_11_0: athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā /
SA01vakobhau:096_13-14_0: sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:096_20-21_0: nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:096_21_0: phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:096_21-22_0: asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:096_22-23_0: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti /
SA01vakobhau:096_23-24_0: dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:096_24-25_0: syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu /
SA01vakobhau:096_26-28_0: kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:097_04_0: kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /
SA01vakobhau:097_05_0: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti /
SA01vakobhau:097_10_1: yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:097_16-17_0: tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_2.60_1: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ //
SA01vakobhau:097_22_0: kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:097_22-23_0: vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva /
SA01vakobhau:097_23-24_0: śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:097_24-25_0: prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:097_28_0: atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha /
SA01vakobhau:097_30-01_0: prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:098_11_0: ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:098_12-13_0: tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:098_14-15_0: avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:098_16-17_0: tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:098_21-22_0: sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam /
SA01vakobhau:098_23-24_0: tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eve"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:098_24-26_0: yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:099_01-02_0: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti /
SA01vakobhau:099_02-03_0: atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:099_04-05_0: tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:099_05-07_0: yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti /
SA01vakobhau:099_07-08_0: evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:099_08-10_0: phalacihnabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ santatau cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣo 'sti yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:099_10-11_0: naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī /
SA01vakobhau:099_12-13_0: atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:099_14_0: evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti /
SA01vakobhau:099_17-18_0: nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:099_20-21_0: kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:099_22-23_0: prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:099_23-24_0: dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:099_24-25_0: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā /
SA01vakobhau:099_25-26_0: caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca /
SA01vakobhau:099_27-01_0: ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye /
SA01vakobhau:100_06_0: yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya nālambanam/
SA01vakobhau:100_08-09_0: ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:100_13_0: ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ /
