SA01vakobhau:100_15_0: na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:100_19-18_0: athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:101_09_0: tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:101_10_0: ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca /
SA01vakobhau:101_14-15_0: sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:101_19-20_0: anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva /
SA01vakobhau:101_20-21_0: āha tu "pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:101_22_0: nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:101_25_0: yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:101_26-27_0: sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi /
SA01vakobhau:102_01-02_0: kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:102_02-04_0: teṣāmapi ca kramotpattau kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇādanavasthāprasaṅga syādityanantarabhedāyāḥ kāraṇaparaṃparāyā anāditvābhyupagamādayamīśvarakāraṇādhimuktaḥ śākyayūrvīyameva nyāyaṃ nātivṛttaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:102_06-08_0: yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:102_08-09_0: yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya /
SA01vakobhau:102_12-13_0: ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:102_13_0: sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat /
SA01vakobhau:102_17_0: svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti /
SA01vakobhau:102_17-18_0: akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:102_19_0: gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ "dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:103_08_0: bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:103_09-10_0: abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti /
SA01vakobhau:103_20-21_0: kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:103_26_0: tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:104_02-03_0: śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:104_17_0: rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:104_20_0: rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:105_12_0: ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:105_14-15_0: ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam /
SA01vakobhau:106_04_0: triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:106_19-20_0: svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:106_22-23_0: svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:106_26-27_0: svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe /
SA01vakobhau:106_27-28_0: te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:107_03-05_0: kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:107_05-07_0: kāmāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ svebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatreryāpathikavipākajābhyāmārūpyāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:107_07-08_0: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam/
SA01vakobhau:107_11-12_0: kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt /
SA01vakobhau:107_13-14_0: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:107_17-18_0: rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:107_21-22_0: svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe /
SA01vakobhau:108_01-02_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam /
SA01vakobhau:108_14-16_0: trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati "aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:108_17_0: aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:108_19-21_0: syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād /
SA01vakobhau:108_23-24_0: nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:108_25-26_0: tadyathā "sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇa"miti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:108_26-27_0: anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam /
SA01vakobhau:109_04_0: yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:109_05_0: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ
SA01vakobhau:109_06_0: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:109_08-09_0: akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca /
SA01vakobhau:109_16-17_0: rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:109_22-23_0: yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:109_24-25_0: "kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:109_24-25_1: ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu //"
SA01vakobhau:109_26_0: tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:109_26-02_0: kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya samyagdṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānāt kāmarūpāvacarayoranivṛtāvyākṛtayorvairāgyataḥ rūpārūpyāvacarayoḥ kuśalayostatastyasamādhilābhataḥ śaikṣāśaikṣasya ca niyāmāvakrāntyarhattvayoḥ śeṣamata evavyākhyānādavadhāryam /
SA01vakobhau:111_07-09_0: ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena /
SA01vakobhau:111_11-12_0: saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti /
SA01vakobhau:111_13-14_0: ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni /
SA01vakobhau:111_14-15_0: kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam /
SA01vakobhau:111_24-25_0: caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:111_26-27_0: brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti /
SA01vakobhau:112_02-03_0: atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:112_07_0: yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti /
SA01vakobhau:112_09-10_0: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate /
SA01vakobhau:112_13_0: rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:112_15_0: tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:112_16-17_0: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate /
SA01vakobhau:112_18_0: rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /
SA01vakobhau:112_20-21_0: tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:112_21-23_0: api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:112_25-26_0: kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca /
SA01vakobhau:112_28-01_0: kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti /
SA01vakobhau:113_03-04_0: "na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:113_03-04_1: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam" //
SA01vakobhau:113_06-07_0: "na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /
SA01vakobhau:113_09-10_0: te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:113_09-10_1: śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi"//
SA01vakobhau:113_11-12_0: kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:113_23-24_0: pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat /
SA01vakobhau:113_25-27_0: tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā "īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām /
SA01vakobhau:113_27-28_0: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:113_28-29_0: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:114_03-04_0: yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam /
SA01vakobhau:114_09_0: kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:114_14-15_0: prajñyaptipūktam "catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:114_16-18_0: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśce"ti /
SA01vakobhau:114_19-20_0: "sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava" iti /
SA01vakobhau:114_20-21_0: atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:114_24-25_0: teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:114_26-26_0: nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:115_01-02_0: pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva /
SA01vakobhau:115_10_0: yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:115_10-11_0: yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ "nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:115_11-12_0: nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti /
SA01vakobhau:115_13-14_0: gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham /
SA01vakobhau:115_14-15_0: avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:115_21-22_0: sūtre uktaḥ "rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:115_25-27_0: rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:115_27-28_0: te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti /
SA01vakobhau:115_29-31_0: anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:115_31-02_0: yadidamuktaṃ sūtre "teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:116_02_0: asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti /
SA01vakobhau:116_03-05_0: tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:116_06-07_0: kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma "imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:116_08-09_0: tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva /
SA01vakobhau:116_09-10_0: rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:116_11-12_0: anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran /
SA01vakobhau:116_14-15_0: te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:116_15-16_0: sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:116_16-17_0: yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti /
SA01vakobhau:116_18-19_0: śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate /
SA01vakobhau:116_20-22_0: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:116_23-24_0: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti /
SA01vakobhau:116_24-25_0: mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:116_26-27_0: ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:116_27-28_0: rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:117_01-02_0: tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:117_02-03_0: dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:117_07-08_0: atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:117_08_0: kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate
SA01vakobhau:117_12-13_0: caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti /
SA01vakobhau:117_19-20_0: anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra
SA01vakobhau:117_22_1: rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti /
SA01vakobhau:117_27-28_0: na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti /
SA01vakobhau:117_28-29_0: kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti /
SA01vakobhau:118_01-02_0: yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:118_03_0: natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:118_03-04_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:118_04-05_0: yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:118_06-07_0: evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:118_07-08_0: pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:118_11_0: api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:118_11-13_0: vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa /
SA01vakobhau:118_13-14_0: ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:118_15-16_0: atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta /
SA01vakobhau:118_16_0: naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta /
SA01vakobhau:118_19-20_0: dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:119_01_0: ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante /
SA01vakobhau:119_01-02_0: ata eva upapadane (read: upapādane) sādhukāritvādupapādukā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:119_03_0: atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha
SA01vakobhau:119_05-07_0: aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni /
SA01vakobhau:119_15_0: "pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān /
SA01vakobhau:119_16_0: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me //"
SA01vakobhau:119_17-18_0: atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate /
SA01vakobhau:119_19-21_0: jñātisaṃbandhena mahataḥ śākyavaṃśasya dharme 'vataraṇārthaṃ cakravarttivaṃśyo 'yamiti cānyeṣāṃ bahumānādarāvarjanārthaṃ manuṣyabhūtā api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham /
SA01vakobhau:119_21-23_0: itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke prādurbhūya māyayā lokaṃ bhakṣayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:119_24-26_0: śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate niśānta iva tailapradyoto 'ntardhīyate /
SA01vakobhau:119_26-27_0: ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:119_27-02_0: yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre "upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:120_02-03_0: bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:120_04-05_0: sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti /
SA01vakobhau:120_08-09_0: maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:120_18-19_0: santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya /
SA01vakobhau:120_20-21_0: vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya /
SA01vakobhau:120_26_0: tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:120_26-27_0: na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:120_27-30_0: tathā digbhedavyavasthiterekasminvāpyambudeśe svābhimukhadeśasthānāṃ rūpāṇāmanyo 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti na tatra rūpāntaropapattiryuktā /
SA01vakobhau:121_01-02_0: upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:121_03-04_0: anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam /
SA01vakobhau:121_05-06_0: sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati //
SA01vakobhau:121_06_0: acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:121_10-11_0: santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca /
SA01vakobhau:121_13-14_0: bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:121_14-16_0: nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:121_16_0: na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:121_16-17_0: yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:121_20-21_0: narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
SA01vakobhau:121_23-24_0: mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca /
SA01vakobhau:121_28_0: kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā /
SA01vakobhau:121_28-01_0: yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:122_07_0: upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /
SA01vakobhau:122_11-12_0: tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:122_13-14_0: nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā //
SA01vakobhau:122_15-16_0: āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī /
SA01vakobhau:122_16-17_0: sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā /
SA01vakobhau:122_17-18_0: prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:122_19-21_0: upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante /
SA01vakobhau:122_23-24_1: saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:122_26-01_0: kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca /
SA01vakobhau:123_01-02_0: yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:123_02-03_0: yattarhi sūtra uttam "atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita" iti /
SA01vakobhau:123_05-06_0: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante /
SA01vakobhau:123_06_0: ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:123_07-08_0: idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate "pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:123_10_0: na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati /
SA01vakobhau:123_13-14_1: vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave" ti //
SA01vakobhau:123_22-23_0: ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:123_23-25_0: evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet /
SA01vakobhau:123_25-26_0: pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:123_26-27_0: sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat /
SA01vakobhau:123_28-01_0: pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca /
SA01vakobhau:124_01-02_0: ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:124_03_0: yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt /
SA01vakobhau:124_05-06_1: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ" //
SA01vakobhau:124_07_0: naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa /
SA01vakobhau:124_07-08_0: ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti /
SA01vakobhau:124_11-12_0: kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:124_12-13_0: yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi /
SA01vakobhau:124_14-15_0: bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā /
SA01vakobhau:124_20-21_0: tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:124_21_0: caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:124_24-01_0: yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti /
SA01vakobhau:125_11-12_0: tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate /
SA01vakobhau:125_12_0: yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā /
SA01vakobhau:125_21_0: yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:125_22-01_0: yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta /
SA01vakobhau:126_01-02_0: kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:126_03-05_0: te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:126_05-07_0: athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:126_07-08_0: tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām /
SA01vakobhau:126_08-09_0: ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā "acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka" iti /
SA01vakobhau:126_09-10_0: yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:126_11-12_0: sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:126_12_0: niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:126_13-14_0: athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare /
SA01vakobhau:126_14-15_0: tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām /
SA01vakobhau:126_15-17_0: gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti /
SA01vakobhau:126_17-18_0: na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat /
SA01vakobhau:126_21_0: sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:126_21-22_0: tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari /
SA01vakobhau:126_23-24_0: evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau "gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:126_24-25_0: sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:126_27-28_0: sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī /
SA01vakobhau:127_01_0: athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati /
SA01vakobhau:127_02-03_0: athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti" /
SA01vakobhau:127_05-06_0: anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:127_07-08_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati "mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:127_08-09_0: tathā "dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:127_10-11_0: evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate /
SA01vakobhau:127_14-15_0: saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:127_16-17_0: sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam /
SA01vakobhau:127_18-19_0: punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati /
SA01vakobhau:127_19-20_0: yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:127_20-21_0: tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat /
SA01vakobhau:128_09-10_0: kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi /
SA01vakobhau:128_13_0: aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:128_15_0: tadyathā "saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotī"ti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke /
SA01vakobhau:128_17_0: kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan /
SA01vakobhau:128_18-19_0: alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete /
SA01vakobhau:128_19-21_0: śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:128_22-23_0: maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā 'bhirohāmi kūṭāgāraṃ vā paryaṅka veti /
SA01vakobhau:128_24-25_0: saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:128_29_0: sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati /
SA01vakobhau:129_03-04_0: ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:129_05-06_0: yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:129_08_0: kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:129_09-11_0: evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā "asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
SA01vakobhau:129_11-12_0: tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ "/
SA01vakobhau:129_14-15_0: evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti /
SA01vakobhau:129_18_0: kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:129_18-19_0: kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti /
SA01vakobhau:129_19-20_0: tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:129_20-21_0: tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:129_24_0: nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:129_24-25_0: ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:130_06-08_0: tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:130_08-09_0: sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate /
SA01vakobhau:130_09-15_0: yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya tasminvarcaskūpa ivogradurgandhāndhakārasamalapalvale suvahukrimikulasahasrāvāse nityasrāviṇi satatapratikriye śukraśroṇitalasikāmalasaṃklinnaviklinnakvathitapicchile paramavībhatsadarśane chidratanucarmāvacchādite pūrvakarmavīpākarje mahati kāmanāḍīrvaṇe hastaṃ praveśyā ṅgamaṅgaṃ nikṛtyādhyāharanti /
SA01vakobhau:130_16_0: sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate /
SA01vakobhau:130_16-20_0: atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti /
SA01vakobhau:130_20-21_0: tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:130_21-22_0: saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti /
SA01vakobhau:130_24-25_0: etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:130_25-26_0: ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:130_27-28_0: dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:131_05-06_0: tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:131_13-14_0: parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate /
SA01vakobhau:131_14-15_0: tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:131_16-18_0: yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:131_24-25_0: pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:131_27_0: mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:132_03-04_0: saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:132_07-08_0: utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:132_10-11_0: sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:132_17-18_0: yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:132_19_0: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:132_20_0: sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya bhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:132_21_0: tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:133_07-08_0: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:133_12_0: yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma /
SA01vakobhau:133_15-16_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā "pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:133_17-18_0: tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:133_20-21_0: tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvaṃ ko nvahamabhūvaṃ kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:133_22_0: aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:133_23_0: madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti /
SA01vakobhau:133_24-26_0: etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca /
SA01vakobhau:133_26-02_0: tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ "yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:134_02_0: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanī"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:134_03-04_0: tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:134_15_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau /
SA01vakobhau:134_19_0: madhyenaiva hi pūrvāntāparāntayorapi hetuphalavistaraḥ śakyo 'numānumiti noktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:134_20-22_0: yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_3.27_0: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:135_01-02_0: vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:135_03-04_0: yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:135_04-05_0: vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam /
SA01vakobhau:135_05-06_0: "evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatī"ti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:135_10_0: satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti /
SA01vakobhau:135_11-12_0: yadi tarhyantarbhāvenaiva hetuphalabhāvo vijñāyate tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tarhi tatrāntarbhāvā daṅgantaratvaṃ śakyamakarttum /
SA01vakobhau:135_13-14_0: "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja" iti /
SA01vakobhau:135_16-17_0: ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam /
SA01vakobhau:135_20-21_0: nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:135_21-22_0: naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā /
SA01vakobhau:135_22-23_0: yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:135_26-27_0: pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:136_02-03_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā "pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:136_03-04_0: ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:136_06_0: te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati /
SA01vakobhau:136_07-08_0: tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:136_12-13_0: yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca /
SA01vakobhau:136_13-14_0: sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:136_16-17_0: kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:136_18-19_0: yattāvaduktamā "vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī" tyetadutsūtram /
SA01vakobhau:136_20-21_0: yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:136_21_0: na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:136_24-25_0: yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate /
SA01vakobhau:136_25-26_0: na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:136_26-01_0: evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:137_01-02_0: nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:137_02-04_0: yadva "punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum /
SA01vakobhau:137_05-06_0: yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum /
SA01vakobhau:137_06-07_0: satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:137_07-08_0: tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti /
SA01vakobhau:137_09_0: yadapyuktaṃ "heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika" iti /
SA01vakobhau:137_10-12_0: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda" iti /
SA01vakobhau:137_12_0: dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:137_13_0: ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:137_14-15_0: yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:137_19-21_0: yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam /
SA01vakobhau:137_21-22_0: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti /
SA01vakobhau:137_23-24_0: na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:137_24-25_0: utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta /
SA01vakobhau:138_02_0: upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti /
SA01vakobhau:138_04-05_0: ekasya hi kartturdvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:138_05-06_0: nacāsau pūrvamutpādāt kaścidasti yaḥ pūrvaṃ pratītyottarakālamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:138_08-09_1: saha cet ktvā na siddho 'tra pūrvakālavidhānata" iti //
SA01vakobhau:138_10-11_0: kimavastho dharmaḥ utpadyate varttamāna utāho 'nāgate iti /
SA01vakobhau:138_12-13_0: athānāgata utpadyate kathamasataḥ kartṛtvaṃ siddhatyakartṛkā vā kriyeti /
SA01vakobhau:138_13-14_0: ato yadavastha utpadyate tadavastha eva pratyeti /
SA01vakobhau:138_15-16_0: aniṣpannaṃ cedaṃ yaduta śābdikīyaṃ kartṛkriyāvyavasthānaṃ bhavatītyeṣa karttā bhūtirityeṣā kriyā /
SA01vakobhau:138_16-17_0: na cātra bhaviturarthāt bhūtimanyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:138_17-18_0: asmin satyasya bhāvaḥ asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:138_20-23_2: sahakāle 'pi ca ktvā 'sti dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam /
SA01vakobhau:138_20-23_3: āsyaṃ vyādāya śete ca paścāccetkiṃ na saṃvṛte //"
SA01vakobhau:138_26-27_0: tāṃ tāṃ kāraṇa sāmagrīṃ prati ityānāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:138_27-28_0: iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamiti"ti /
SA01vakobhau:138_28-01_0: kimarthaṃ punarbhagavān paryāyadvayamāha "asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādādidamutpadyate" iti /
SA01vakobhau:139_02-03_0: yathā 'nyatrāha "avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:139_03-04_0: asminnaṅge satīdaṃ bhavati asya punaraṅgasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:139_04-05_0: pūrvānte sati madhyānto bhavati madhyāntasyotpādādaparānta utpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:139_06_0: kadāciddhi samanantaramavidyāyāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti kadācit pāraṃparyeṇeti /
SA01vakobhau:139_07-08_0: nāsati heto bhāvo bhavati na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikātkiñcidutpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:139_08-09_0: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:139_10-11_0: santi tarhi kecidya ātmani satyāśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ bhāvaṃ parikalpayanti avidyādīnāṃ cotpādāttadutpattim /
SA01vakobhau:139_11-12_0: atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:139_12-13_0: yadutā "vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati"ti /
SA01vakobhau:139_17-18_0: utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam /
SA01vakobhau:139_18-19_0: punarāha "asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī"ti "kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:139_19-20_0: syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam /
SA01vakobhau:139_21-22_0: pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:139_23-24_0: itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya /
SA01vakobhau:139_24-25_0: kathaṃ puna "rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:139_25-02_0: bālo hi pratītyasamutpannaṃ saṃskāramātramidamityaprajānan ātmadṛṣṭyasmimānābhiniviṣṭa ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ puṇyaṃ sukhāduḥkhāsukhārthamānaijjamaihikasukhārthamapuṇyaṃ tasyāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ karmākṣepavaśācca vijñānasaṃatatistāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:140_03-04_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe "vijñānaṃ katamat /
SA01vakobhau:140_05-06_0: vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam /
SA01vakobhau:140_12_1: yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:140_17-18_0: yathokta "mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:140_22-23_0: jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:140_25_1: sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:141_02-03_0: yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:141_11_1: sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:141_11-12_0: yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:141_14_0: avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata /
SA01vakobhau:141_17_0: "rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatī"tyuktam sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:141_18_0: na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:141_18-19_0: yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā /
SA01vakobhau:141_20_0: kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati /
SA01vakobhau:141_22_0: uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:141_25_0: yo 'pi manyate "sarvakleśā avidye"ti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:141_25-01_0: sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta /
SA01vakobhau:142_01-02_0: anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:142_05-06_0: yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām /
SA01vakobhau:142_07_0: tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi /
SA01vakobhau:142_10-12_0: yā 'sau sūtra uktā "so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ mayatānāṃ sarveṣāmahaṅkāramamakārāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayānāṃ prahāṇāt parijñānānniśchāyo nivṛta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:142_13_0: yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum /
SA01vakobhau:142_18_0: yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:142_19_1: teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt /
SA01vakobhau:142_19-20_0: iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare //
SA01vakobhau:143_05-06_0: sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:143_06-08_0: keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti "iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ" iti /
SA01vakobhau:143_08-09_0: kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti "ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:143_12-13_0: tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:143_15-16_0: na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:143_16-17_0: yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam /
SA01vakobhau:143_17_0: tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:143_18-19_0: na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam /
SA01vakobhau:143_19-20_0: ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke /
SA01vakobhau:143_20-21_0: ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti "iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:143_22-23_0: saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti /
SA01vakobhau:144_02-04_0: yathoktaṃ "cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:144_06-07_0: tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:144_12-13_0: anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:144_20_0: athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam /
SA01vakobhau:144_20-21_0: sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti
SA01vakobhau:144_23_1: tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ
SA01vakobhau:145_03-04_0: atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam /
SA01vakobhau:145_07-08_0: yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:145_10-11_0: "cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa" iti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:145_12-13_0: yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:145_13-14_0: tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:145_14-15_0: anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:145_16-18_0: tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:145_18-19_0: pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:145_19_0: yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:145_20-21_0: so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:145_21-22_0: evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:145_22-23_0: pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:145_25-26_0: kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti /
SA01vakobhau:146_01-02_0: tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:146_05-06_0: na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:146_06-07_0: savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ
SA01vakobhau:146_08-09_0: tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:146_12-14_0: yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetane"ti /
SA01vakobhau:146_14-15_0: sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam /
SA01vakobhau:146_15-16_0: samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā "maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī" tyajñāpakametat /
SA01vakobhau:146_16-18_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā" ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:146_18-20_0: tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ "yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:146_20-21_0: tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti /
SA01vakobhau:146_22_0: yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ "trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ" iti /
SA01vakobhau:146_22-23_0: tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:146_23-24_0: tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā /
SA01vakobhau:146_27_0: saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:147_12-13_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:147_17-18_0: itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:147_18-19_0: yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:147_23-24_0: athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:147_26_0: āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:149_06-08_0: yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:149_17-21_0: kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikaiścaturbhiḥ kliṣṭairgandharasālambanān paryudasya ārūpyāvacareṇaikena kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā vitarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ prathamadhyānabhumikairdaśabhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:150_01-02_0: nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam /
SA01vakobhau:150_02-03_0: ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:150_04-05_0: anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:150_05-07_0: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti /
SA01vakobhau:150_07-08_0: nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:150_19_0: sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:150_22-23_0: tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām /
SA01vakobhau:150_23-01_0: yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:151_01-02_0: yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:151_02-03_0: yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:151_03-06_0: yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ tāvat kleśo bījādivadveditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:151_09-10_0: santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante /
SA01vakobhau:151_10-11_0: yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni /
SA01vakobhau:151_13-14_0: pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu /
SA01vakobhau:151_14-15_0: yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:151_15-16_0: na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati /
SA01vakobhau:151_22-23_0: nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:151_24-25_0: yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate /
SA01vakobhau:152_04-05_0: kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:152_09-10_0: eko dharmo bhagavatā svayamabhijñāyābhisaṃbadhyākhyāto "yaduta sarvasttvā āhārasthitikā" iti sūtrapadam /
SA01vakobhau:152_21-22_0: yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:152_25_0: āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate /
SA01vakobhau:152_25-26_0: rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti /
SA01vakobhau:153_01-02_0: yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam /
SA01vakobhau:153_05-06_0: cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante /
SA01vakobhau:153_07-09_0: api tu sūtra uktaṃ "catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:153_10_0: bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /
SA01vakobhau:153_16-18_0: "tathāsti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanam" iti sūtra catuḥkoṭikāt /
SA01vakobhau:153_21_0: atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya /
SA01vakobhau:153_23-24_0: bhagavatā "atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:153_24-26_0: evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau /
SA01vakobhau:153_26-27_0: tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti /
SA01vakobhau:153_27-02_0: punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti /
SA01vakobhau:154_02-04_0: saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre 'vataranti /
SA01vakobhau:154_04-05_0: tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:154_06-07_0: yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:154_09-10_0: nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:154_14-16_0: manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam /
SA01vakobhau:154_16-17_0: pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:154_18_0: yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:154_19-20_0: prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:154_20-21_0: tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:154_23-24_0: syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:154_24-25_0: yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva /
SA01vakobhau:154_25-26_0: dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:154_28-01_0: yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca "kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:155_01-03_0: yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:155_04_0: so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti /
SA01vakobhau:155_05-07_0: uktaṃ bhagavatā "yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam /
SA01vakobhau:155_09-10_0: syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti /
SA01vakobhau:155_11_0: tadetanna varṇayanti "bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:155_11-12_0: ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:155_12-13_0: natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā /
SA01vakobhau:155_14_0: bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:155_14-15_0: sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:155_16-17_0: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva /
SA01vakobhau:155_18-19_0: ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:155_20_1: katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha
SA01vakobhau:155_24_0: ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:156_08-09_0: yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:156_16_0: atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:156_21-22_0: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:156_23-24_0: kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:157_01-03_0: tāni cāptejovāyudhātūnāmanyatamenātiprāyaṃ gatena niśitaśastrasaṃpātasyardhināḍītībrābhirvedanābhiḥ chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante /
SA01vakobhau:157_06_0: kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:157_07-09_0: vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:157_10-11_0: vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate /
SA01vakobhau:157_11-12_0: so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:157_16-17_0: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktva"miti sūtram /
SA01vakobhau:157_19-20_0: ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:157_21-22_0: na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:158_02-04_0: karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:158_09-10_0: yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke /
SA01vakobhau:158_14-15_0: sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:158_20-21_0: samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām /
SA01vakobhau:159_13_0: suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu /
SA01vakobhau:159_13-14_0: yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:159_15-16_0: tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:159_18-19_0: tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti /
SA01vakobhau:159_19-20_0: evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:159_20-21_0: na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:159_22-23_0: sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta /
SA01vakobhau:159_25_1: tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:159_25-26_0: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante /
SA01vakobhau:160_03_0: kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:160_05_0: iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:160_07-09_0: tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:160_11_0: yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:160_13-14_0: eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya /
SA01vakobhau:160_14-15_0: taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate /
SA01vakobhau:160_22-23_0: pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:161_02-03_0: yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:161_07-08_0: taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya /
SA01vakobhau:161_13-15_0: tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti /
SA01vakobhau:161_15_0: nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:161_19_0: itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:162_01-02_0: itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena /
SA01vakobhau:162_07-08_0: sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre /
SA01vakobhau:162_08-09_0: yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni /
SA01vakobhau:162_18-19_0: ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:162_22-23_0: tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca /
SA01vakobhau:162_25-26_0: tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:163_02-03_0: asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:163_04-05_0: anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti /
SA01vakobhau:163_09-10_0: pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca /
SA01vakobhau:163_22-23_0: yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam /
SA01vakobhau:163_24-25_0: kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti /
SA01vakobhau:163_25-01_0: kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:164_01-02_0: asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti /
SA01vakobhau:164_03-04_0: teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:164_06-08_0: caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante adhastiryagapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante /
SA01vakobhau:164_10_0: ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante /
SA01vakobhau:164_13-14_0: kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti /
SA01vakobhau:164_16-17_1: duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā" iti //
SA01vakobhau:164_18-19_0: ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti /
SA01vakobhau:164_20-21_0: teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:164_25-01_0: tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca /
SA01vakobhau:165_06-07_0: teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:165_08-09_0: teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti /
SA01vakobhau:165_09-10_0: tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:165_20-21_0: sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:165_23-24_0: kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:165_26-27_0: yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:166_02_0: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ /
