SA01vakobhau:179_16-17_0: tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca /
SA01vakobhau:179_18-19_0: iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā /
SA01vakobhau:179_19-20_0: athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:179_21-22_0: krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante /
SA01vakobhau:179_22-23_0: dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate /
SA01vakobhau:179_23-24_0: yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:179_27-01_0: vivartamāne loke ekānna viṃśatirantarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmatikrāmanti /
SA01vakobhau:180_06_0: tebhyo hi daśavarṣāyuṣkebhya utkarṣaṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:180_13-14_0: nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:180_19_0: viṃśatimevāntarakalpān vivartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvṛtta āste /
SA01vakobhau:180_19-20_0: yadyapi tadānīmutkarṣā apakarṣāśca na pravartante kālastu samānaḥ parisaṃkhyāyate /
SA01vakobhau:180_20-22_0: tatraikenāntara kalpena bhājanānyabhinivartante ekānnaviṃśatyā 'ntarakalpairāvāsyante ekenāntarakalpena bhājanāni vidhvasyante ekānnaviṃśatyā śūnyī bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:180_25-01_0: yaducyate tribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpānāṃ budhatvaṃ prāpyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:182_02_0: na tu naiva parisaṃkhyātuṃ śakyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:182_03_0: kintu khalu kālaprakarṣeṇaiva kṛtapraṇidhānā bodhisattvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA01vakobhau:182_04-05_0: mahatāṃ hi puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ bahubhirduṣkaraśatasahasraistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante bodhisattvāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:182_06_0: yadyapyanyathā'pyasti mokṣāvakāśaḥ kimarthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante /
SA01vakobhau:182_06-07_0: parārthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante kathaṃ parānapi mahato duḥkhaughāt paritrātuṃ śaknuyāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:182_08_0: eṣa eva teṣāṃ svārtho yaḥ parārthastasyābhimatatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:182_09-11_0: kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante /
SA01vakobhau:182_11-12_0: tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam /
SA01vakobhau:182_12-15_0: yathaiva cābhyāsavaśādanātmabhūteṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānabhijñā ātmasnehaṃ niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya pareṣvapekṣāṃ vardhayitvā taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahantīti saṃbhāvyam /
SA01vakobhau:182_15-16_0: gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti /
SA01vakobhau:182_17-20_1: madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:182_23-24_0: aśītivarṣaśatāyupi prajāyāmapakarṣe ārabdhe yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣo manuṣyā bhavantyetasminnantare buddhā utpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:183_01-02_0: tadā hi pañca kaṣāyā abhyutsadā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:183_03_0: apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:183_11-14_0: tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti "parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:183_17-18_0: mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:183_20_0: śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum /
SA01vakobhau:183_24_0: anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam /
SA01vakobhau:184_03_0: amite cāyuṣi manuṣyāṇāṃ yāvadaśītisahasrake cotpattiścakravarttināṃ nādhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:184_07-08_0: prathama eṣāmuttamo dvitīya upottamaḥ tṛtīyo madhyamaścaturtho 'dhamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:184_13-16_0: "yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadaīva poṣadhe pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopoṣadho poṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ sa rājā bhavati cakravartī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:184_19-20_0: sūtra ukta" masthānamanavakāśo yadapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatāvarhantau samyaksaṃbuddhau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate sthānametadvidyate yadaikastathāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:184_21-22_0: kimatra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturloka iṣṭa utāho sarvalokadhātava iti /
SA01vakobhau:184_24_0: eka eva hi bhagavān sarvatra śaktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:184_24-25_0: yatra buddha eko na śaktaḥ syād vineyān vinetuṃ tatrā'nyo'pi na śakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:184_25-27_0: uktaṃ ca sūtre "sa cettvāṃ śāriputra kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet asti kaścidetarhi śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamaḥ śramaṇena gotamena yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /
SA01vakobhau:184_28-01_0: sa cenmāṃ bhadanta kaścidupasaṃkramyevaṃ pṛcchettasyāhaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryā nāsti kaścidetarhhi śṛamaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamo bhagavatā yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /
SA01vakobhau:185_01-03_0: saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītaṃ asthānamanavakāso yadapūrvācaramau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:185_03-04_0: yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ brahmasūtre "yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko vaśe me'tra vartata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:185_07_0: bahavo hi samaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:185_07-09_0: na caikatra bahūnāṃ buddhānāṃ yugapat yoga utpattuṃ na cāsti tadut pattau kakścit pratibandhaḥ iti niyataṃ lokadhātvantareṣūtpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:185_09-10_0: anantā lokadhātava iti na śakyaṃ bhagavatā kalpamapyāyurvirbhratā yitheha tathā'nyeṣvapi ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu vyāpartuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣāyuṣam /
SA01vakobhau:185_11-13_0: asya pudgalasyedamindriyam iyatā kālelāmuṣmin deśe amuṃ pudgalamāgamyāsya doṣasya parihārādasyāṅgasyopasaṃhārādanena prayogeṇānutpannaṃ votpatsyate aparipūrṇaṃ vā paripūrayiṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:185_13-15_0: yattvidaṃ sūtramatropanīta "masthānamanavakāśo yadpūrvācaramau dvī tathāgatāvekatra loka utpadyeyātāmi"ti tadevedaṃ saṃpradhāryate kimidamekaṃ lokadhātumadhikṛtyoktamāhosvit sarvāniti /
SA01vakobhau:185_16-17_0: athaitat kṣamyate idaṃ tu kasmānna kṣamyate "puṇyastu buddhānāṃ loka utpāda" iti /
SA01vakobhau:185_17-18_0: yadi bahūnāṃ bahuṣu syānna doṣaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:185_18-19_0: athaiṅkasminnapi kasmāt dvau tathāgatau na sahotpadyete /
SA01vakobhau:185_19-21_0: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti aho vatāhamandhe loke 'pariṇāyake buddho loka utpadyeyamanāthānāṃ nātha iti /
SA01vakobhau:185_22-23_0: ekasminhi buddhe sutarāmādriyante durlabha īdṛśo'nya iti manyamānāḥ sutarāṃ cābhitvarante śāsanapratipattau mā'smin gate parinirvṛte vā 'nāthā bhūmeti /
SA01vakobhau:185_24_0: athaite cakravartinaḥ suvarṇādimayaiścakraiḥ pṛthivīṃ jayantaḥ kathaṃ jayanti /
SA01vakobhau:185_26_0: yasya sauvarṇa cakraṃ bhavati taṃ koṭarājānaḥ svayaṃ pratyudgacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:185_26-01_0: ime devasya janapadāḥ ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca /
SA01vakobhau:186_02-03_0: yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa svayameva teṣāmantikaṃ yāti paścādasya prahvībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:186_03-04_0: yasya tāmramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gatvā kalahāyate paścāt prahvībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:186_04-05_0: yasya śastramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gacchati anyonyaṃ śastrāṇyāvahanti paścānnamanti /
SA01vakobhau:186_07-08_0: śastreṇāpi jayatāṃ badho na pravartate nirjitya ca sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:186_08-09_0: sūtra uktaṃ "rājñaścakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:186_10-11_0: tadyathā cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:186_12-13_0: yena tu sattvena tatsaṃbandha saṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ tasminnutpanne svānyevainaṃ karmāṇyutpādayanti /
SA01vakobhau:186_19_0: kiṃ khalu prāthamakalpikā api manuṣyāḥ sarājakā āsan /
SA01vakobhau:186_22-24_0: sūtra uktaṃ "te bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā āvikalā ahīnendriyāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃ prabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣaḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:186_27-01_0: tasyānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ sattvo gandhaṃ ghrātvā rasaṃ svāditavān bhakṣitavāṃśca /
SA01vakobhau:187_02-03_0: teṣāṃ tadāhārābhyāsāt kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ ca kāye'vakrāntaṃ prabhāvā antarhitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:187_04-05_0: so'pyeṣāṃ bhūmirasa āsvādagṛddhānāṃ krameṇāntarhito bhūmiparpaṭakaṃ prādurbhūtam /
SA01vakobhau:187_06-08_0: tasyedānīmaudārikatvānniḥsyandanirvāhārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mūtrapurīṣamārgau saha strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ prādurbhūtau saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnam /
SA01vakobhau:187_08-09_0: teṣāmanyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśādayoniśomanaskāragrāhagrāsatāṃ gatānāṃ kāmarāga udīrṇo yato vipratipannāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:187_10-11_0: te ca khalu taṃ śāliṃ sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśārthaṃ prātaśca prātarāśārthaṃ praveśayanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:187_12-13_0: teṣāṃ tatra mamakāra utpanne sa śālirlūno lūno na punarjāyate sma /
SA01vakobhau:187_13-14_0: tataḥ kṣetrāṇi pravibhajya sveṣvāgrahaṃ kṛtvā parakīyaṃ hartumārabdhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:187_14-15_0: taisteṣāmaṅkuśārthaṃ sametyānyatamaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ kṣetrāṇi pālayituṃ ṣaṣṭhabhāgena bhṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:187_15-16_0: tasya kṣetrāṇāmadhipatiḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriya iti saṃjñotpannā /
SA01vakobhau:187_16-17_0: mahājanakāyasya saṃmataḥ prajāṃ ca rañjayatīti mahāsaṃmato rājeti samjñotpannā /
SA01vakobhau:187_17-18_0: tatra ye gṛhebhyo vahirmanasaḥ saṃvṛttāsteṣāṃ brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñotpannā /
SA01vakobhau:187_18-19_0: athānyatamasya rājño lobhāt samvibhāgamakurvantaḥ sattvānāṃ tāskaryaṃ prācuryamāpannaṃ sa tān śastreṇopasaṃkramate sma /
SA01vakobhau:187_20_0: tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti
SA01vakobhau:187_22-23_0: tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:187_23_0: ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:187_26-02_0: antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:188_02-03_0: teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ vadhakacittaṃ ca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:188_03-05_0: tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:188_05-06_0: punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti /
SA01vakobhau:188_07-08_0: punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:188_09_1: ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:188_10-11_0: te ca manuṣyā jighatsādaurbalyaparītāḥ sametya kālaṃ kurvanti samudreṣu cānāgatajanatā'nugrahārthaṃ bījānyavasthāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:188_12-14_0: teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti /
SA01vakobhau:188_14-17_0: te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya bahulodakena kvāthayitvā pivanti /
SA01vakobhau:188_17-19_0: yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:188_20_0: atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavanti
SA01vakobhau:vakk_3.99_0: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam //
SA01vakobhau:188_23_0: durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:188_24-25_0: vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca /
SA01vakobhau:189_02_0: ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī /
SA01vakobhau:189_02-03_0: saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī /
SA01vakobhau:189_06-07_0: nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:189_07-08_0: "vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta" iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti /
SA01vakobhau:189_13-14_0: citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam /
SA01vakobhau:189_14-15_0: samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:189_17_0: anyo vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭo'nyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti /
SA01vakobhau:189_17-18_0: ta eva hi te yathāsaṃniviṣṭāstāṃ tāṃ saṃjñāṃ labhnte /
SA01vakobhau:189_19_0: ko hi tadā sataḥ paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:189_20-21_0: anekā śrayasaṃyogāpekṣaṇe daśāmātrasaṃyoge paṭopalabdhiḥ syānna vā kadācit /
SA01vakobhau:189_24-26_0: citrarūpāditve vijātīyārambho'pi syāt acitre ca pārśvāntare paṭasyādarśanaṃ citradarśanaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:189_27-02_0: paramāṇvatīndriyatve'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ yathā teṣāṃ kāryārambhakatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ ca taimirikāṇāṃ ca vikīrṇakeśopalabdhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:190_02-03_0: rūpādiṣveva ca paramāṇusaṃjñāniveśā ttadvināśe siddhaḥ paramāṇuvināśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:190_03-04_0: dravyaṃ hi paramāṇuranyacca rūpādibhyo dravyamiti na teṣaṃ vināśe tadvināśaḥ siddhyati /
SA01vakobhau:190_04-05_0: ayuktamasyānyatvaṃ yāvatā na nirdhāryate kenacit imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi ima eṣāṃ rūpādaya iti /
SA01vakobhau:190_06-07_0: cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca prajñāyante dagdheṣu corṇākarpāsakusumbhakuṅkumādiṣu tadbuddhyabhāvādrūpādibhedeṣveva tadbuddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:190_08-09_0: ko vā bālapralāpeṣvādaraḥ iti tiṣṭhatu tāvadevāpratiṣedhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:190_12_1: tejaḥsaṃvartanyā dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho dahyate /
SA01vakobhau:190_20_0: ata evatasmin kṛtsnakāyakrauryāpagamāt duḥkhendriyasya nirodha uktaḥ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:190_21-22_0: iti yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhuta ādhyātmiko'pakṣālastasyām dhyānopapattau tathābhūto bāhya iti /
SA01vakobhau:190_23-24_0: pṛthivyeva hi bhājanākhyā tasyāṃ tejojalavāyubhirvirodho na pṛthhivyeti /
SA01vakobhau:190_26-27_0: ato'tra bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti nāstyatra saṃvartanī /
SA01vakobhau:190_27-01_0: nahi taiḥ śakyamārupyān praveṣṭuṃ nāpyanyatra gantumiti /
SA01vakobhau:191_13_0: etena krameṇāpsaṃvartanīnāṃ gate saptake punaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ saptako bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:191_15-17_0: yathiva hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattiviśeṣādātmabhāvānāṃ sthitiviśeṣastathā bhājanānāmapāmiti tā etā bhavanti ṣaṭpañcāśattejaḥ saṃvartanyaḥ saptāpsaṃvarttanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvarttanī /
SA01vakobhau:191_17-18_0: evaṃ ca prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ sunītaṃ bhavati "catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:191_19-20_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇa" // iti /
SA01vakobhau:192_03_0: atha yadetatsattvabhājanalokasya bahudhā vaicitryamukta tat kena kṛtam /
SA01vakobhau:192_06-07_0: yadi karmajaṃ kasmātsattvānāṃ karmabhiḥ kuṅkumacandanādayo ramyatarā jāyante na teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:192_07-08_0: karmāṇyeva tānyevañjātīyāti vyābhiśrakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ yadāśrayāśca vraṇabhūtā jāyante bhogāśca ramyāstatpratīkārabhūtāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:192_11_0: sūtra uktaṃ "dve karmaṇī cetanā karma cetayitvā ce"ti /
SA01vakobhau:192_12_0: te ete dve karmaṇī trīṇi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:192_20_0: yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye /
SA01vakobhau:192_22_0: te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /
SA01vakobhau:192_25_0: cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:193_03_1: sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate /
SA01vakobhau:193_08-09_0: so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:193_10_2: na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:193_12-13_0: na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate /
SA01vakobhau:193_14-15_0: kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:193_19-20_0: kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:193_21-22_0: na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā /
SA01vakobhau:193_22-24_0: yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:193_24-25_0: antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam /
SA01vakobhau:193_25-26_0: na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:193_27_0: sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena /
SA01vakobhau:194_01-02_0: yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau
SA01vakobhau:194_04-06_0: ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā /
SA01vakobhau:194_06-07_0: na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:194_09-10_0: yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:194_10-11_0: tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti /
SA01vakobhau:194_12-14_0: tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:194_16_0: ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:194_18-19_0: tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti /
SA01vakobhau:194_22-23_0: cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:194_23-24_0: yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām /
SA01vakobhau:194_24-25_0: sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:194_25-26_0: yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:194_26-01_0: yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt /
SA01vakobhau:194_06_0: yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate /
SA01vakobhau:195_08_0: na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi /
SA01vakobhau:195_09-10_0: atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:195_11_0: na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:195_12_0: yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām /
SA01vakobhau:195_12-14_0: nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi /
SA01vakobhau:195_14-16_0: yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:195_18-19_0: athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti /
SA01vakobhau:195_20_0: tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti /
SA01vakobhau:195_20-21_0: kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī /
SA01vakobhau:195_22-23_0: yattarhi "cetanā karma cetayitvā ce"tyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:195_23-24_0: yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:195_24-25_0: evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante /
SA01vakobhau:195_28-01_0: sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate /
SA01vakobhau:196_01-02_0: dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim /
SA01vakobhau:196_12-13_0: yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne /
SA01vakobhau:196_13-14_0: na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam /
SA01vakobhau:196_14-17_0: "ebhiḥ saptabhiraupadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam /
SA01vakobhau:196_18-19_0: akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau /
SA01vakobhau:196_22-23_0: tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:196_24-26_0: yattarhīdamuktaṃ "tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:196_26-27_0: pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:197_01-02_0: na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti /
SA01vakobhau:197_07-08_0: yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:197_11_0: paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /
SA01vakobhau:197_12-13_0: yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:197_13-15_0: yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syu"ryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastvi"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:197_15-19_0: yadapyuktaṃ "puṇyābhivṛddhivacanāditi tatrāpi pūrvācāryā nirdiśanti "dharmatā hyeṣā yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti yenāyatyāṃ bahutaraphalābhiniṣpattaye samarthā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:197_19-20_0: "idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ" bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti /
SA01vakobhau:197_20-21_0: atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:197_21-23_0: kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:197_24-25_0: avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:197_26-01_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamārdhiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyapramāṇastannidānadāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya" ityatra tadānīṃ dātuḥ kaścetanāviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:198_02-03_0: yadapyuktaṃ "kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantī"ti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:198_03-05_0: tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:198_07-08_0: upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:198_08-09_0: haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:198_11_0: svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:198_11-13_0: ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:198_13-14_0: kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:198_15-16_0: yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:198_20-21_0: kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate /
SA01vakobhau:198_22-23_0: yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate /
SA01vakobhau:198_24-27_0: yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate /
SA01vakobhau:198_27-01_0: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:199_03-04_0: tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA01vakobhau:199_05-06_0: prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti /
SA01vakobhau:199_07-09_0: tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam /
SA01vakobhau:199_09-10_0: yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt /
SA01vakobhau:199_12-13_0: yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:199_14_0: na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:199_14-15_0: kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate /
SA01vakobhau:199_15-16_0: sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya /
SA01vakobhau:199_24-25_0: kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya /
SA01vakobhau:199_27-01_0: asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:200_10-12_0: sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt /
SA01vakobhau:200_14-16_0: kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na /
SA01vakobhau:200_18-19_0: anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:200_19-20_0: evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:200_20-21_0: anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet /
SA01vakobhau:200_22_0: tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam /
SA01vakobhau:200_24-25_0: evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:200_27-28_0: avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:201_17_1: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam /
SA01vakobhau:201_20-21_0: sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt /
SA01vakobhau:201_21-22_0: tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam /
SA01vakobhau:201_24-25_0: na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet /
SA01vakobhau:201_25-26_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti /
SA01vakobhau:202_02-03_0: tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:202_05_0: kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:202_06_1: caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca /
SA01vakobhau:202_14-15_0: taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat /
SA01vakobhau:202_17-18_0: kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:202_19-20_0: prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:203_01_0: evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:203_02_0: paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:203_06-07_0: yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām /
SA01vakobhau:203_07-09_0: samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam /
SA01vakobhau:203_11-12_0: kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ "tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta" mityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:203_17-18_0: tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī /
SA01vakobhau:204_01_0: naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:204_11_1: kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:204_19-20_0: na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:204_21-22_0: kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:204_23-24_1: svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita" iti /
SA01vakobhau:204_25-26_0: anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:205_02_0: vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:205_05-06_0: na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:205_06-07_0: yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:205_07_0: yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:205_08_0: yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:205_20-21_0: bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca /
SA01vakobhau:206_03-04_0: parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:206_04-05_0: śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:206_05_0: upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:206_05-06_0: na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe /
SA01vakobhau:206_06-07_0: tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:206_08-10_0: ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca āhosvit pṛthageva te sakalā jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:206_14-17_0: yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu pravartata iti nidānaviśeṣādviratīnāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:206_17-18_0: evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:206_22_0: kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:207_06-07_0: sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:207_12-13_0: na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:207_13_0: sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:207_20-21_0: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:208_17_0: tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:208_17-18_0: ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate //
SA01vakobhau:208_21-22_0: evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:208_23-24_1: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ / iti /
SA01vakobhau:209_02-03_0: pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:209_04-05_0: kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:209_08-09_0: yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:209_14-15_0: asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:209_19_0: prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate /
SA01vakobhau:209_21-22_0: sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:210_02-03_0: tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau /
SA01vakobhau:210_07_0: yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:210_08_0: yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:210_11-12_0: kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:210_16-18_0: yena prasādavegenāsaṃvarasthasya kuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate stavavandanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate vadhabandhanatāḍanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ tau yāvadanuvartete tāvatte apyavijñaptī /
SA01vakobhau:210_18-19_0: sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:210_20_0: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:210_21_0: sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:211_01_0: anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:211_04_0: durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati /
SA01vakobhau:211_15-17_0: mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:211_19-20_0: avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam /
SA01vakobhau:211_24-25_0: yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:211_28-30_0: tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni anāgamyasyānantaraṃ ceti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:212_02_1: yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param /
SA01vakobhau:212_04-09_0: svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā yaśaḥprabhṛtīnām śāsturabhyupagamānmahākāśyapasya praśnārādhanena sodāyinaḥ gurudharmābhyupagamena mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti teṣāṃ nāvaśyaṃ vijñaptyadhīnaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:212_09-10_0: sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:212_12-13_0: saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:212_17-19_0: athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau /
SA01vakobhau:212_20-22_0: kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti /
SA01vakobhau:213_02-03_0: na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:213_03-04_0: evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:213_04-06_0: yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena /
SA01vakobhau:213_07-08_0: yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so 'vaśyaṃ labheta /
SA01vakobhau:213_15-16_0: yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:213_16-17_0: anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham /
SA01vakobhau:213_17-18_0: nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra sthāsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:213_24-25_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate /
SA01vakobhau:214_01-02_0: "poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila poṣadho 'yami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:214_11_0: madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet /
SA01vakobhau:214_16_0: evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta /
SA01vakobhau:214_16-18_0: akālabhojanādvirati muktvā "anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:214_19-20_0: yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga upavāso draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:214_20-21_0: akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:214_21-22_0: dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:214_22-23_0: natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:214_23-24_0: pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:214_27-01_0: anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:215_01-04_0: sūtra uktaṃ "yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya /
SA01vakobhau:215_12-13_0: yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā saṃvareṇopāsako 'sti /
SA01vakobhau:215_15-16_0: yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:215_18_0: yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:215_20_0: na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:215_22-23_0: tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā "avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:216_01_0: ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:216_02-03_0: ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:216_03-04_0: upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:216_04-05_0: "kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati /"
SA01vakobhau:216_05-06_0: yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām /
SA01vakobhau:216_08-09_0: vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:216_12-13_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt pṛthagjanasyādhimātraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:216_15_0: yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.32_1: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam //
SA01vakobhau:216_18-20_0: yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:216_22-23_0: yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:216_24-26_0: yattu sūtra uktaṃ "yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi śaraṇaṃ gacchatami "ti /
SA01vakobhau:216_26-27_0: yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham /
SA01vakobhau:216_28-29_0: yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:217_01_0: śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti /
SA01vakobhau:217_02-03_0: anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:217_04_0: yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati /
SA01vakobhau:217_04-05_0: evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:217_13-14_0: yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:217_20-21_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt /
SA01vakobhau:217_24-25_0: sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran /
SA01vakobhau:217_26-01_0: janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti /
SA01vakobhau:218_02-03_0: ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na /
SA01vakobhau:218_07-08_0: na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:218_09-10_0: atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:218_13-15_0: sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi /
SA01vakobhau:218_15-16_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:218_22_0: śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet /
SA01vakobhau:218_23-24_0: na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati /
SA01vakobhau:218_27-28_0: idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami" tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:219_01-02_0: utsargavihitasyāpi glāneṣu prajñaptisāvadyasya punarmadyasyāpavādaḥ prasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ madnīyamātrānīyamanāt/
SA01vakobhau:219_04-05_0: ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:219_07-08_0: te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:219_11-12_0: ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau /
SA01vakobhau:219_14_0: vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:219_15-17_0: ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate /
SA01vakobhau:219_19-21_0: maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:219_21-22_0: santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:220_01-02_0: natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:220_04-05_0: atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:220_07_0: sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā /
SA01vakobhau:220_11-12_0: paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:220_12-13_0: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte /
SA01vakobhau:220_13-14_0: asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:220_14_0: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte /
SA01vakobhau:220_16_0: asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:220_18-19_0: yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:220_24-25_0: yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:220_25-26_0: evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:220_26-01_0: yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām /
SA01vakobhau:221_01_0: na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:221_01-02_0: ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:221_02-04_0: yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:221_04-06_0: evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta /
SA01vakobhau:221_10-12_0: yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā /
SA01vakobhau:221_13-15_0: tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:221_15-16_0: rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā /
SA01vakobhau:221_18-20_0: aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:221_20-21_0: na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:221_21-22_0: āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:221_22-23_0: yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:221_23-01_0: kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:222_01-02_0: kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti /
SA01vakobhau:222_03-04_0: mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:222_04-05_0: yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte /
SA01vakobhau:222_05_0: sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:222_05-07_0: yathā bhyupagamaṃ vikalo 'pi syāt prādeśiko 'pyasaṃvaraḥ saṃvaraścānyatrāṣṭavidhāditi sautrāntikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:222_14-15_0: athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi /
SA01vakobhau:222_15-16_0: ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato 'syāvijñaptirutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:222_22-24_0: śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca /
SA01vakobhau:223_08_1: na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:223_10-11_0: āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti /
SA01vakobhau:223_13_0: katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti /
SA01vakobhau:223_18-21_0: na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi atra śāstraiva datto 'nuyoga "stadyathā tālo mastakācchinno 'bhavyo 'ṅkuritatvāya abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāptu" mityupamāṃ kurvatā /
SA01vakobhau:223_21-22_0: evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti /
SA01vakobhau:223_22-24_0: sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:223_23-02_0: yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ /
SA01vakobhau:224_08-09_0: "mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī" astyetaduktam /
SA01vakobhau:224_09-10_0: sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat /
SA01vakobhau:224_10-11_0: yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:224_11_0: na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:224_12-13_0: kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā /
SA01vakobhau:224_13-14_0: yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate /
SA01vakobhau:224_14-15_0: tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā /
SA01vakobhau:224_15-16_0: kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya /
SA01vakobhau:224_21_0: sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate /
SA01vakobhau:224_21-22_0: upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit /
SA01vakobhau:224_23_0: yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate
SA01vakobhau:224_25_0: anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:225_04-05_0: yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate /
SA01vakobhau:225_09-10_0: ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram /
SA01vakobhau:225_15-16_0: yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi cchidyate /
SA01vakobhau:225_20-21_0: yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate /
SA01vakobhau:226_01-02_0: yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:226_03_0: atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:226_09_0: saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:226_10-12_0: sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:226_16-17_0: āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām /
SA01vakobhau:226_18-20_0: api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti /
SA01vakobhau:226_20-21_0: yattarhi sūtra uktam "aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya bhāvanādabhyudgamyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:227_03_0: ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:227_04_0: ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate /
SA01vakobhau:227_07-08_0: kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:227_08-09_0: tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:227_09-10_0: tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:227_15-16_0: nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:227_22-24_0: yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:227_24-25_0: rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate /
SA01vakobhau:228_02_0: yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
SA01vakobhau:228_05-06_0: eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni /
SA01vakobhau:228_18_0: itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:228_19_0: dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke /
SA01vakobhau:228_20-21_0: śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ "syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta /
SA01vakobhau:229_02-03_0: evaṃ tarhi "sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā" "diṣṭa-vipākaṃ ca kuśala" mityasya virodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:229_04-05_0: sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā /
SA01vakobhau:229_05-06_0: sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate /
SA01vakobhau:229_11-13_0: yathoktaṃ "cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedī"tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:229_15-16_0: yathoktaṃ "yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:229_16-17_0: nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate /
SA01vakobhau:229_20_0: taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:229_24-25_0: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena /
SA01vakobhau:230_01_0: tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:230_05-06_0: asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat /
SA01vakobhau:230_06-07_0: yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti /
SA01vakobhau:230_15-16_0: syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau /
SA01vakobhau:230_19_0: katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau /
SA01vakobhau:230_21-22_0: sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01vakobhau:230_24_0: narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya /
SA01vakobhau:230_27-28_0: yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti /
SA01vakobhau:231_02-03_0: āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti /
SA01vakobhau:231_03-04_0: na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:231_06-07_0: parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum /
SA01vakobhau:231_19-20_0: eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.54_1: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat //
SA01vakobhau:231_25-01_0: yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:232_02-03_0: tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:232_04_0: tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat /
SA01vakobhau:232_11-12_0: tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:232_14_0: yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:232_17_0: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:232_27-01_0: ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:233_01-03_0: śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:233_04-05_0: syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī /
SA01vakobhau:233_09_0: avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre /
SA01vakobhau:233_13-15_0: tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat /
SA01vakobhau:233_16_1: katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena /
SA01vakobhau:233_20-23_0: ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate /
SA01vakobhau:233_26-01_0: amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti /
SA01vakobhau:234_03_0: kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:234_03-04_0: nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:234_05-06_0: karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:234_06-07_0: asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:234_07-08_0: kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:234_13-15_0: te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:235_06_0: aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:235_08-09_0: yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca /
SA01vakobhau:235_12-13_0: na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt /
SA01vakobhau:235_13-14_0: nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:235_16_0: anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
SA01vakobhau:235_18-19_0: uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya "ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:235_22_0: kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.61_1: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat //
SA01vakobhau:236_03-04_0: darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma /
SA01vakobhau:236_05_0: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
SA01vakobhau:236_06-07_0: navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya /
SA01vakobhau:236_09-10_0: dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya /
SA01vakobhau:236_10-11_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena /
SA01vakobhau:236_12-13_0: ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:236_15-16_0: anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:236_16-18_0: narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:236_23-24_0: sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:237_03-04_0: aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti /
SA01vakobhau:237_05_0: api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma /
SA01vakobhau:237_12-13_0: eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham /
SA01vakobhau:237_17-18_0: akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
SA01vakobhau:237_19-20_0: kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt /
SA01vakobhau:237_20-21_0: sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:238_05-06_0: teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:238_07-08_0: akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:238_08-09_0: yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:238_10_0: vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva /
SA01vakobhau:238_11-12_0: kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā /
SA01vakobhau:238_21-22_0: te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva /
SA01vakobhau:238_25_0: kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca /
SA01vakobhau:239_07-08_0: yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:239_11-12_0: yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:239_13-16_0: yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:239_16-17_0: yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:239_17-18_0: dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca /
SA01vakobhau:239_19-21_0: yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:239_21-22_0: abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:239_23-24_0: kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte /
SA01vakobhau:239_24-25_0: yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:240_01-02_0: yaduktaṃ "yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha" iti tanā vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:240_03_0: yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ "syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:240_03-06_0: syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha" ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:240_07_0: vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:240_08-10_0: tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:240_10-14_0: yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti /
SA01vakobhau:240_16-17_0: sūtra uktaṃ "prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭi"riti /
SA01vakobhau:240_17-18_0: tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:240_20-22_0: tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya /
SA01vakobhau:240_22-23_0: mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām /
SA01vakobhau:240_23-24_0: duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:241_02-03_0: lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā /
SA01vakobhau:241_04-05_0: duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ "sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate /
SA01vakobhau:241_05-06_0: tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce" ti /
SA01vakobhau:241_09_0: mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe /
SA01vakobhau:241_10-11_0: upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrā"miti /
SA01vakobhau:241_22_0: lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:241_27-01_0: tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:242_02-03_0: tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:242_03-04_0: tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:242_04-05_0: tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham /
SA01vakobhau:242_06_0: yaduktaṃ "na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhe"tyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā /
SA01vakobhau:242_16-17_0: eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā
SA01vakobhau:242_18-19_0: ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ
SA01vakobhau:242_23-24_0: yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na /
SA01vakobhau:242_25_0: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ
SA01vakobhau:242_26-27_0: ata evocyate "syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:242_27-02_0: syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryā"diti kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:243_04_0: thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:243_05_0: tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:243_05-06_0: yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:243_08_0: yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:243_09-11_0: yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:243_12-13_0: kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate /
SA01vakobhau:243_15_0: yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā /
SA01vakobhau:243_16-17_0: yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati /
SA01vakobhau:243_20-21_0: yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:243_26_0: tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti /
SA01vakobhau:243_26-27_0: abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:244_01-03_0: nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:244_04-05_0: acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti /
SA01vakobhau:244_08-09_0: yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:244_11-12_0: asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:244_14-15_0: agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:244_15-16_0: anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā /
SA01vakobhau:244_16_0: adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā /
SA01vakobhau:244_17-18_0: garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:244_18-19_0: yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:244_22_1: tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā /
SA01vakobhau:244_23_0: kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:244_25-01_0: yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:245_02-03_0: kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:245_04-05_0: ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe /
SA01vakobhau:245_05-06_0: yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:245_09-11_0: "adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:245_11-12_0: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:245_19-21_0: sūtraṃ tāvat "tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:245_21-22_0: api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:245_22-24_0: ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta /
SA01vakobhau:245_24-25_0: atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityu"ktam /
SA01vakobhau:245_26-27_0: ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:245_27-28_0: na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma /
SA01vakobhau:245_28-01_0: atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:246_04_0: ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante /
SA01vakobhau:246_11_0: syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:246_11-12_0: syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:246_13-14_0: yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati /
SA01vakobhau:246_17_0: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam /
SA01vakobhau:246_20-22_0: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam /
SA01vakobhau:247_02_0: ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:247_05-06_0: tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti /
SA01vakobhau:247_06-07_0: evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:247_07-08_0: kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:247_08-09_0: naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni /
SA01vakobhau:247_12-13_0: aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:247_14-15_0: tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre "so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye" tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:247_15-16_0: yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare /
SA01vakobhau:247_22_0: śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:247_22-24_0: tadyathā "nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.78_0: trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca //
SA01vakobhau:248_03_0: abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:248_03-04_0: tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:248_04-06_0: sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti /
SA01vakobhau:248_08-09_0: prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:248_10-11_0: ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:248_12_0: api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:248_13-14_0: ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:248_17-18_0: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:248_18-20_0: akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:249_05-06_0: yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti /
SA01vakobhau:249_07-08_0: sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā /
SA01vakobhau:249_16-18_0: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:249_20-21_0: eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi /
SA01vakobhau:249_22-23_0: pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke /
SA01vakobhau:250_11_0: yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:250_16-17_0: navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat /
SA01vakobhau:250_20-22_0: tameva saṃdhāyoktam "abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati" iti /
SA01vakobhau:250_22-24_0: upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:250_25-26_0: ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti /
SA01vakobhau:250_26-01_0: evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti /
SA01vakobhau:251_04_0: ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake /
SA01vakobhau:251_05-06_0: tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti /
SA01vakobhau:251_10-11_0: vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā /
SA01vakobhau:251_18_0: ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane /
SA01vakobhau:251_21_0: kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
SA01vakobhau:251_23_0: ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate /
SA01vakobhau:252_03-04_0: saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne /
SA01vakobhau:252_05-06_0: tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte /
SA01vakobhau:252_07-09_0: sarvā ca dhyānānāsrava saṃvarasahavartinī cetanā 'nyatra kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne /
SA01vakobhau:252_11-12_0: kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā /
SA01vakobhau:252_14_0: ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi /
SA01vakobhau:253_02-03_0: te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti /
SA01vakobhau:253_03-04_0: gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:253_04_0: agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:253_06-07_0: narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante /
SA01vakobhau:253_08_0: yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati /
SA01vakobhau:253_11-12_0: pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante /
SA01vakobhau:253_14_0: kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva /
SA01vakobhau:253_16-17_0: yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:253_21-22_0: tatraite sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi saṃvidyante 'nyatra narakottarakurubhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:253_22-23_0: te punastiryakpreteṣu saṃvaranirmuktā rūpadhātau tu saṃvarasaṃgṛhītā anyatrobhayathā /
SA01vakobhau:254_01-05_0: sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena bhogavyasanī bhavatikāmamithyācārena sa saṃpannadāraḥ mṛṣāvādenābhyākhyānabahulaḥ paiśunyena mitrabhedo 'sya bhavati pāruṣyeṇāmanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpenānādeyavākyaḥ abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:254_09-12_0: adattādānenāśanirajobahulāḥ kāmamithyācāreṇa rajo 'vakīrṇāḥ mṛṣāvādena durgandhāḥ paiśunyenotkūlanikūlāḥ pāruṣyeṇoparajāṅgalā pratikuṣṭāḥ pāpabhūmayaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpena viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā /
SA01vakobhau:254_15_0: yāni pūrvaṃ pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ katamat karma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ prahāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:254_17-18_0: prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya
SA01vakobhau:254_23-24_0: evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:254_24-25_0: sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:255_05-06_0: ata ājīvo duḥkhaśodha ityādarotpādanārthaṃ tatrāsau pṛthagnirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:255_13_0: śīlaskandhikāyāṃ hi bhagavatā hastiyuddha darśanādīnyapi mithyājīve nyastāni /
SA01vakobhau:255_17_0: prahāṇārthaṃ mārgaḥ prahīyante vā 'nena kleśā iti prahāṇamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:255_18_0: tasminsāsrave yat karma tat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam /
SA01vakobhau:255_24_0: anāsrave prahāṇamārge yatkarma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:256_01-02_0: yaccānyat prahāṇamārgātsāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhirvisaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:256_03_0: anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣāṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhau:256_04_0: prahāṇamārgādanyadanāsravaṃ karma avyākṛtaṃ ca karma tribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.88_0: catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:256_06-07_0: kuśalsya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:256_10_1: akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
SA01vakobhau:256_12-13_0: avyākṛte hi satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśana heyānāṃ ca niḥṣyandaphalam /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.89_0: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:256_15_0: avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphalel /
SA01vakobhau:257_03_0: svabhūmikasya karmaṇaḥ svabhūmikā dharmāścatvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:257_08_0: śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
SA01vakobhau:257_11_0: dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_4.92_0: tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca //
SA01vakobhau:257_15-16_0: śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāmanyasya karmaṇo naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
SA01vakobhau:257_17_0: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:257_21_0: bhāvanāheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
SA01vakobhau:257_23_0: apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:258_03-04_0: śāstreṣu ayogavihitaṃ yogavihitam, naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitaṃ ca karmoktam /
SA01vakobhau:258_07-08_0: yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:258_11_0: kimekaṃ karma ekameva janmākṣipati atha naikamapi /
SA01vakobhau:258_14_0: ekameva janmākṣipatyekameva ca karma nānekaṃ janmeti nikāyasabhāgasyākhyā /
SA01vakobhau:258_15-16_0: yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ "so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:258_17_0: tena hyasau samṛdviṃ labdvā jātismaraḥ punaranyat puṇyaṃ kṛtavān /
SA01vakobhau:258_18-19_0: yathā manuṣyo dīnārottho 'nena sahasraṃ nirviśyāha ekena dīnāreṇāhamaita dīśvaryaṃ prāpta iti /
SA01vakobhau:258_19-20_0: tasya taṃ piṇḍapātamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā dānacetanānāṃ pravāho mahānutpannaḥ kayācit kiñcitphalaṃ parigṛhītamiti /
SA01vakobhau:258_20-21_0: anekenāpyekamākṣipyate mā bhūt khaṇḍaśo nikāyasabhāgasyākṣepa iti /
