SA01vakobhau:273_09-10_0: yadapi na prakṛtyā dauḥśīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptamakālabhojanādikaṃ tasmādapi dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam /
SA01vakobhau:273_18-19_0: maulaiḥ karmapathairviśuddhaṃ bhavati sāmantakairviśuddhaṃ vitarkairanupahataṃ smṛtyā 'nuparigahītaṃ nirvāṇapariṇāmitaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:274_07_0: sutra uktaṃ "catvāraḥ pudgalā brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:274_11_0: yāvatā puṇyena kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam /
SA01vakobhau:274_13_0: "brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:274_16-17_0: ato mahatīṃ ta ātmanaḥ puṇyajyāniṃ kurvanti ye viparītadharmaṃ deśayanti /
SA01vakobhau:274_20-21_0: puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ yasminnutpanne niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:274_21-23_0: yasya saṃsārādīnavanairātmyanirvāṇaguṇadyotikāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā romaharṣāśrūpātau bhavatastasyāsti mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamityavaseyaṃ pravṛṣīvāṅkuraprarohāt khalavileṣu bījāstitvam /
SA01vakobhau:275_01_0: yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanā kāvyaṃ saṃkhyeti ka eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:275_09_0: kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnā iti paryāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:277_03-04_0: tāni karmāṇyanuśayavaśādupacayaṃ gacchanti antareṇa cānuśayān bhavābhinirvarttane na samarthāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:277_06_0: kleśo hi pravartamāno daśa kṛtyāni karoti /
SA01vakobhau:277_06-09_0: mūlaṃ ca dṛḍhīkaroti saṃtatimavasthāpayati kṣetramāpādayati niḥṣyandaṃ nirvartayati karmabhavamabhinirharati svasaṃbhāraṃ arigṛhṇāti ālambane saṃmohayati vijñānasroto namayati kuśalapakṣādvyutkrāmati pandhanārthaṃ ca spharati dhātvanatikramayogeneti /
SA01vakobhau:277_17_0: ta ete ṣaḍnuśayāḥ sūtre rāgasya dvidhā bhedaṃ kṛtvā saptoktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:277_17-19_0: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśyaḥ avidyānuśayo dṛṣṭyanuśayo vicikitsānuśaya iti /
SA01vakobhau:277_19-01_0: kathamidaṃ jñātavyaṃ kāmarāga evānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ āhosvit kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāganuśayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:278_03-04_0: tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaktvasamavahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyata"iti /
SA01vakobhau:278_12-13_0: yasmādanuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate utpannācca parihīyate tasmānna viprayuktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:278_17-18_0: tadidamajñāpakaṃ yasmādyo viprayuktamanuśayamicchati sa etatsarvamanuśayakṛtaṃ necchati /
SA01vakobhau:278_24-01_0: yastu kleśānāṃ bījārthamarthāntaraṃ vīprayuktamanuśayaṃ kalpayati tena smṛtibījamapyarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:279_01-03_0: yattarhi sūtre kleśa evānuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke "so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:279_05_0: ya eṣa sūtre rāgasya bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:279_12-13_0: te ca sattvāḥ samāpattiṃ sāśrayā māsvādayanta ātmabhāvamevāsvādayanti kāmavītarāgatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:279_17_0: ṣaṇṇāmanuśayānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā daśa bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:279_20-21_0: kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśat ārūpyāvacarā ekatriṃśat /
SA01vakobhau:280_03_0: ya ete daśānuśayā uktā ete kāmadhātau daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ santi /
SA01vakobhau:280_04-05_0: sapta nirodhadarśanaheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:280_14_0: kīdṛśā ete duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kīdṛśā yāvad bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:280_15-17_0: tā eva dvādaśa dṛṣṭayo bhavanti catasro vicikitsāḥ pañca rāgāḥ pañca pratighāḥ pañca mānāṃ pañcāvidyā ityete kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:280_20_0: pañcaprakāraṃ pratighamapahāya ta eva rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:281_01_0: ya ime darśanaprahātavyānuśayā uktāḥ kimete niyataṃ darśanenaiva prahīyante /
SA01vakobhau:281_04_0: ye bhavāgrabhūmijā anvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayāste darśanaheyā eva na bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:p28/107-28108_0: śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāyogaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:281_10_0: sarvāsu bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāste ubhayeṣāṃ nityaṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:281_10-11_0: naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyanta ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:281_12-14_0: tathāhi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināmekatyaśāśvatikānām ahetusamutpattikānāṃ ca vītarāgāṇāṃ ca kāmadhātvālambanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:281_13-14_0: na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhāturālambanaṃ vītarāgatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:281_14-15_0: tasmāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva tā aprahīṇā iti /
SA01vakobhau:281_15-16_0: dṛṣṭyutpādasamakālaṃ te parihīṇā devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:281_17_0: dṛṣṭayaḥ paṇca nāmato nirdiṣṭā na tu svabhāvatastat kastāsāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:281_24-01_0: yathā gamyeta satkāyadṛṣṭiriyaṃ nātmani nātmīye veti /
SA01vakobhau:282_01-03_0: yathoktaṃ "ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:282_04-05_0: sarvaiva hi viparītasvabhāvapravṛṭtā dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ ekaiva tūktā /
SA01vakobhau:282_09-10_0: taṃ ca hetuṃ paśyati prajāpatimanyaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:282_10-11_0: agnijalapraveśādayaśca na hetuḥ svargasya tāṃśca hetuṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:282_11-12_0: śīlavratamātrakaṃ sāṃkhyayogajñānādayaśca na mārgo mokṣāsya tāṃśca mārgaṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:282_12-13_0: atrāpi kilādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta ityetāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo veditavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:282_14-15_0: yo hi kaścidīśvaraḥ prajāpatimanyaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ paśyati sa tannityamekaṃ cātmānaṃ kartāramabhiniviśya /
SA01vakobhau:282_18_0: duḥkhadarśanādeva hi teṣu tau nityātmagrāhau prahīyete /
SA01vakobhau:282_19-20_0: yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva /
SA01vakobhau:282_20-22_0: "ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ,
SA01vakobhau:282_20-22_1: sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:282_22-23_0: akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:282_27-28_0: yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:283_01_0: athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha /
SA01vakobhau:283_01-02_0: so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti /
SA01vakobhau:283_03-04_0: yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:283_11-13_0: ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:283_20-21_0: anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:283_21-22_0: yattarhi sūtre ukta "manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:284_03-04_0: loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti /
SA01vakobhau:284_04-05_0: ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:284_07-08_0: duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:284_08-09_0: itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti /
SA01vakobhau:284_11-12_0: na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:284_12-13_0: sūtre 'pi coktaṃ "yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA01vakobhau:284_13-14_0: yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:284_14-16_0: tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat /
SA01vakobhau:284_19_0: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:284_22_0: atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:285_06-07_0: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:285_07_0: nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna" iti /
SA01vakobhau:285_13-14_0: nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam /
SA01vakobhau:285_14_0: asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate /
SA01vakobhau:285_15-17_0: prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā /
SA01vakobhau:285_20-21_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati /
SA01vakobhau:285_23-24_0: yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_5.12_1: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā //
SA01vakobhau:286_20-21_0: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā /
SA01vakobhau:287_01_0: sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:287_02-04_0: atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:287_05-06_0: evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:287_14-15_0: kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā" iti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:287_15-17_0: yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:287_19-20_0: kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:287_23_0: sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam /
SA01vakobhau:288_01-02_0: ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:288_12-13_0: nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva /
SA01vakobhau:288_13-14_0: mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:288_16-17_0: yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti /
SA01vakobhau:289_01-02_0: varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat /
SA01vakobhau:289_12-13_0: ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate /
SA01vakobhau:289_13_0: asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam /
SA01vakobhau:289_20-21_0: yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante /
SA01vakobhau:289_23-01_0: kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_5.18_0: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ //
SA01vakobhau:290_07-08_0: te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:290_16-17_0: ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati /
SA01vakobhau:290_17-19_0: ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā "etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:291_13-14_0: setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:291_17-18_0: vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti /
SA01vakobhau:292_08_0: yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:292_15-16_0: kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti /
SA01vakobhau:292_16-17_0: kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam /
SA01vakobhau:292_23-24_0: yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:292_24-01_0: manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:293_01-02_0: tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:293_05-07_0: "tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ rūpamanityaṃ yāvadvijñāna duḥkhaprajñaptiryāvanmārgaprajñaptirekāṃśena vyākarttavyamarthopasaṃhitatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:293_07-08_0: vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:293_09_1: sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
SA01vakobhau:293_10_1: sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:293_15_0: na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti /
SA01vakobhau:293_16-17_0: yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:293_18_0: yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:293_18-19_0: paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:293_19-20_0: sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:293_23-24_0: sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:293_24-25_0: saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:293_26-27_0: saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti /
SA01vakobhau:293_27-28_0: sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi /
SA01vakobhau:293_28-29_0: evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:294_03-04_0: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna" iti /
SA01vakobhau:294_04-05_0: yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:294_05-06_0: idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti /
SA01vakobhau:294_11-12_0: atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:295_04_1: kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā /
SA01vakobhau:295_04-05_0: na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:295_10-11_0: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā '"tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:295_12-13_0: anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:295_16-17_0: cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:295_17_0: asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:295_20-21_0: yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:295_23_0: yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:296_04_0: ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:296_04-06_0: ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:296_10-11_0: dharmasyādhvasu, pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam /
SA01vakobhau:296_11-12_0: yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam /
SA01vakobhau:296_12-13_0: yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam /
SA01vakobhau:296_14-15_0: evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:296_19_0: tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:296_20-21_0: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:296_21-23_0: yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti /
SA01vakobhau:297_01-02_0: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:297_02-03_0: yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti /
SA01vakobhau:297_04_0: eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:297_05-06_0: puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam /
SA01vakobhau:297_07-08_0: atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA01vakobhau:297_12_0: yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:297_15-16_0: yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram /
SA01vakobhau:297_16-17_0: atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:298_01-02_0: atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca /
SA01vakobhau:298_02-03_0: ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:298_08-09_0: yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati /
SA01vakobhau:298_10_1: yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:298_11-12_0: yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti /
SA01vakobhau:298_15_0: tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti /
SA01vakobhau:298_16-17_0: kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:298_17-18_0: yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:298_19-20_0: nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:299_02-03_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:299_05-07_0: tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā "astyatītamastyanāgatami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:299_07-09_0: yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti /
SA01vakobhau:299_10-11_0: yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā "yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:299_11-12_0: kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:299_12-13_0: tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam /
SA01vakobhau:299_13_0: anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet /
SA01vakobhau:299_13-15_0: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā "cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:299_15-16_0: iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatī"ti
SA01vakobhau:299_16-17_0: yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:299_18-19_0: yadapyuktaṃ "dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam /
SA01vakobhau:299_20-21_0: yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:299_21-22_0: yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:299_25_0: yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti /
SA01vakobhau:299_25-26_0: na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:299_26-27_0: yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate /
SA01vakobhau:299_27-28_0: yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate /
SA01vakobhau:300_01_1: yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam /
SA01vakobhau:300_03-04_0: na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:300_04-05_0: sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati "cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatī"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:300_06_0: yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:300_09_1: evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta /
SA01vakobhau:300_10-11_0: evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:300_14-15_0: yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam "yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:300_16-18_0: itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:300_18-19_0: yadanyatra bhagavatoktam "etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:300_20-21_0: sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:300_22_0: naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:300_24-25_0: yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:301_09-10_0: yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:301_10-11_0: tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:301_19-20_0: yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti /
SA01vakobhau:301_21_0: syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā
SA01vakobhau:301_24-01_0: duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:302_01_0: tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:302_02-03_0: bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:302_04-05_0: kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:302_05-06_0: kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti /
SA01vakobhau:302_06-07_0: samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca /
SA01vakobhau:302_07-09_0: tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:302_13-14_0: kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:302_14-15_0: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti /
SA01vakobhau:302_17_0: rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:302_21_0: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:303_02-03_0: kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:303_05-07_0: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:303_16-17_0: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:303_18-19_0: sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:303_19-20_0: sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:303_23-25_0: tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:303_26-01_0: tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:304_01-02_0: tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya /
SA01vakobhau:304_02-05_0: idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:305_11-13_0: apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:305_19-20_0: tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:305_21_0: evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ
SA01vakobhau:306_02-03_0: eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
SA01vakobhau:306_08-09_0: avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:306_14_1: nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:306_18_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:306_21-22_0: te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:306_22-23_0: yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:307_04-05_0: evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:307_07-08_0: na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt /
SA01vakobhau:307_08-09_0: miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:307_20-21_0: gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi /
SA01vakobhau:308_01_0: asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā /
SA01vakobhau:308_02-04_0: vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ kāmādhyavasānaṃ tadanyacittam paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA01vakobhau:308_05-06_0: cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:308_16_0: āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:308_19-20_0: sā teṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ gratiprasravdhyā 'lpakṛcchreṇānusrota uhyata''; iti sūtravādānusārāt /
SA01vakobhau:309_05-06_0: ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta /
SA01vakobhau:309_06-07_0: āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:309_12-13_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak /
SA01vakobhau:309_15-16_0: ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte /
SA01vakobhau:309_16-17_0: ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:309_18-19_0: atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:310_02_0: tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:310_03-04_0: avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni /
SA01vakobhau:310_08-09_0: tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum /
SA01vakobhau:310_10-12_0: yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:311_04-06_0: eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA01vakobhau:311_12-13_0: tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:311_14-15_0: rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:312_04_1: tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te /
SA01vakobhau:312_08-09_0: ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:312_19_0: kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:313_08_0: pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:313_13-14_0: cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /
SA01vakobhau:313_14-15_0: sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA01vakobhau:313_16_0: viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate /
SA01vakobhau:314_06_0: ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:315_03_0: etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne /
SA01vakobhau:315_05-06_0: sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:315_14-15_0: darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi /
SA01vakobhau:315_17-18_0: ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:316_03-04_0: yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:316_13-14_0: tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:318_03-04_0: na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:318_06-07_0: āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante /
SA01vakobhau:318_08-09_0: yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca /
SA01vakobhau:318_13-14_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam /
SA01vakobhau:318_20-01_0: ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:319_02-03_0: jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:319_08-10_0: styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni /
SA01vakobhau:319_10-11_0: etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:319_13-15_0: cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:319_15-17_0: tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:319_19-20_0: visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante /
SA01vakobhau:319_20-21_0: yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:320_05_0: yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate /
SA01vakobhau:320_13_0: vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati /
SA01vakobhau:320_19_0: na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:321_17_0: kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:322_06_0: sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate /
SA01vakobhau:322_06-07_0: dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca /
SA01vakobhau:322_17_0: yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ
SA01vakobhau:322_19_0: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:322_19-21_0: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇamekā nirodhadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ dvitīyā mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:323_04-05_0: kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām /
SA01vakobhau:323_15-16_0: vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:323_17_0: sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti /
SA01vakobhau:324_12_0: dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām /
SA01vakobhau:324_18_0: yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate /
SA01vakobhau:324_18-01_0: pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate /
SA01vakobhau:325_01-02_0: tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu bhavāgravikalīkṛṭam /
SA01vakobhau:325_09-10_0: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:325_10-11_0: sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_5.69_0: bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā //
SA01vakobhau:325_19-20_0: bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:325_20-21_0: parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā /
SA01vakobhau:325_24-25_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:326_02-03_0: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca /
SA01vakobhau:326_05_0: atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_5.70_0: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na //
SA01vakobhau:326_07_0: ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:326_07-08_0: dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:327_13-15_0: "anāsravā mārgasatyami"ti svaśabdena "pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga" iti nirodhasatyaṃ "duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka" ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye /
SA01vakobhau:328_01-02_0: itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:328_04_0: na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati /
SA01vakobhau:328_06-07_0: yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:328_07-08_0: paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam /
SA01vakobhau:328_10-11_0: yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:328_15-16_0: ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:328_19-20_0: ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt /
SA01vakobhau:328_23_1: dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:329_01_0: tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca /
SA01vakobhau:329_04-05_0: tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante /
SA01vakobhau:329_06-07_0: sūtra uktaṃ "sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkh"ti /
SA01vakobhau:329_13-16_0: "ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
SA01vakobhau:329_13-16_1: akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:329_17-18_0: na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti /
SA01vakobhau:329_19_1: pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham /
SA01vakobhau:329_19-20_0: na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt /
SA01vakobhau:329_20-21_0: yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya /
SA01vakobhau:329_23-24_0: ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet /
SA01vakobhau:329_25-26_1: duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti" iti //
SA01vakobhau:330_01_0: sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /
SA01vakobhau:330_06-07_0: na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:330_07_0: saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:330_09-10_0: anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati /
SA01vakobhau:330_10-11_0: nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā /
SA01vakobhau:330_14-15_0: ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:330_15-17_0: na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya /
SA01vakobhau:330_17_0: ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:330_18-20_0: na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa /
SA01vakobhau:330_20-21_0: tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:330_27_0: yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:330_27-02_0: tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:331_03-04_0: yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:331_05-07_0: yattu bhagavatoktaṃ "yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasye"ti tadbhagavataiva nītārthaṃ "saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:331_07-08_0: ato na duḥkha-dukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:331_08-09_0: yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:331_09_0: tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca /
SA01vakobhau:331_10-11_0: kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:331_11-12_0: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
SA01vakobhau:331_12-13_0: idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
SA01vakobhau:331_14-15_0: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati /
SA01vakobhau:331_15-16_0: sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:331_16-17_0: sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt /
SA01vakobhau:331_18-19_0: yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:331_23_0: lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca /
SA01vakobhau:331_23-24_0: tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:331_25-26_0: yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:332_02-04_0: "yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye" ti vistareṇoktvā "yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni prahīṇāni bhavantī" tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:332_04-05_0: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet /
SA01vakobhau:332_06_0: sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:332_06-08_0: yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:332_08-09_0: anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:332_10-11_0: kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:332_11_0: triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:332_11-12_0: ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:332_12-14_0: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatami"tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:332_16_0: āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /
SA01vakobhau:332_17-18_0: sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:332_18-20_0: tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:332_20-21_0: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:332_21-22_0: yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:332_22-23_0: yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:332_23-24_0: dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:333_05_0: "karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:333_09-10_0: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā /
SA01vakobhau:333_14_0: tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:333_17_1: satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti /
SA01vakobhau:333_19_0: yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:333_20-21_0: na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā /
SA01vakobhau:333_21-22_0: na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:333_23-24_0: dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_6.4_0: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
SA01vakobhau:334_03_0: yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat /
SA01vakobhau:334_04_0: tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:334_04-05_0: tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:334_06-07_0: teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam /
SA01vakobhau:334_09-10_0: tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva /
SA01vakobhau:334_11-12_0: yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam /
SA01vakobhau:334_16_0: satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati /
SA01vakobhau:334_17-18_0: śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA01vakobhau:334_18_0: samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:335_01-02_0: suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:335_02-03_0: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare /
SA01vakobhau:335_03-04_0: yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti /
SA01vakobhau:335_08_0: tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha /
SA01vakobhau:335_16-17_0: nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad /
SA01vakobhau:336_15-16_0: dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca /
SA01vakobhau:336_17_0: anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti /
SA01vakobhau:337_07_0: tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:337_11_0: adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:337_15-16_0: tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca /
SA01vakobhau:337_17-19_0: dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām /
SA01vakobhau:338_01-02_0: asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu /
SA01vakobhau:338_02-03_0: sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate /
SA01vakobhau:338_05-06_0: svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:338_06-07_0: sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:338_07-09_0: tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:338_13-14_0: sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:338_14-15_0: evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:338_17_0: so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati /
SA01vakobhau:338_18-19_0: astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01vakobhau:338_21_0: atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:338_24-26_0: alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /
SA01vakobhau:339_09-10_0: pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:339_12-13_0: ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā /
SA01vakobhau:339_19-20_0: gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:339_20-22_0: tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa /
SA01vakobhau:340_02-03_0: kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:340_05_0: niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:340_06-07_0: sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:340_07-08_0: kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti /
SA01vakobhau:340_08_0: upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva /
SA01vakobhau:340_08-10_0: catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati /
SA01vakobhau:340_10-11_0: vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:340_19-20_0: yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante /
SA01vakobhau:340_20-21_0: jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti /
SA01vakobhau:341_12-13_0: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām /
SA01vakobhau:341_14-15_0: sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:342_12-13_0: tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena "tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:342_13-14_0: bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ "tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍhe"ti /
SA01vakobhau:342_14-15_0: yatra tūktaṃ "kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca /
SA01vakobhau:342_17-18_0: yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam /
SA01vakobhau:342_22-23_0: yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:343_01-03_0: śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā /
SA01vakobhau:343_03-04_0: atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:343_08-09_0: saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:343_17-18_0: nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca /
SA01vakobhau:344_12_0: yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:344_18-20_0: yadā kila rūpārupyapratipakṣādyekaikasatyālambanāpahlāsena yāvat kāvāvacarameva dukhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti /
SA01vakobhau:345_04-05_0: te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:345_06-07_0: ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:345_12-13_0: tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:345_16-17_0: mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
SA01vakobhau:346_01-02_0: ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca /
SA01vakobhau:346_02-03_0: eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram /
SA01vakobhau:346_03-05_0: niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti /
SA01vakobhau:346_10_0: anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:346_15-16_0: bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ /
SA01vakobhau:347_04-05_0: yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt /
SA01vakobhau:347_12-13_0: yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:347_15_0: yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni /
SA01vakobhau:348_12_0: ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:348_17-18_0: trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:349_03_0: kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet /
SA01vakobhau:350_13_0: tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:350_14-15_0: yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate
SA01vakobhau:351_02-06_0: evaṃ samanantarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānam kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntirnirodhe dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirnirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ kāmavacaraduḥkhapratipakṣamārge dharmajñānakṣāntirmārge dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntirmārge 'nvayajñānam /
SA01vakobhau:351_14-15_0: duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:351_18_0: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:351_18-21_0: "ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:352_01_0: athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va4itvalābhādekābhisamayaṃ brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:352_01-02_0: antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:352_02-03_0: atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA01vakobhau:352_04_0: evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:352_04-05_0: darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:352_05-07_0: "nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya" iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:352_07-08_0: "yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa" iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:352_12_0: kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:352_17-18_0: yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:352_18-19_0: kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:353_01-02_0: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:353_09-10_0: na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:353_12-13_0: ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau
SA01vakobhau:353_20_0: phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:353_20-22_0: tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:353_24-25_0: yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:354_02-03_0: yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:354_06-07_0: yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:354_09_0: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:354_10_0: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:354_11-12_0: yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:354_12_0: srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā /
SA01vakobhau:354_16_0: tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:354_18-19_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:354_23_0: phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:354_23-24_0: ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate /

SA01vakobhau:356_13-15_0: yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti /

SA01vakobhau:357_16-17_0: tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:357_18-19_0: devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye /

SA01vakobhau:358_09_0: avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta" ityuktaṃ prāk /
SA01vakobhau:358_09-10_0: yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti /
SA01vakobhau:358_10-12_0: vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ /

SA01vakobhau:359_01-02_0: upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt /

SA01vakobhau:359_13-14_0: phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:359_16-19_0: tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto 'kaniṣṭheṣūpapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:359_19-20_0: ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati /
SA01vakobhau:359_21-22_0: sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati /
SA01vakobhau:360_02-04_0: sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:360_05-06_0: akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti /

SA01vakobhau:361_19-20_0: yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ "ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:362_02-03_0: sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:362_03-04_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:362_06_0: atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:362_06-08_0: mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:362_14_0: arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:362_15_0: tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam /
SA01vakobhau:362_15-17_0: evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:362_19_0: yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam /
SA01vakobhau:362_20-21_0: evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:362_21-22_0: dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti /

SA01vakobhau:364_11-12_0: sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:364_14-15_0: navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva /

SA01vakobhau:365_17-19_0: ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti /
SA01vakobhau:365_22-23_0: ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre "śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:365_23-24_0: yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta /

SA01vakobhau:366_13-14_0: yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti /
SA01vakobhau:366_18-19_0: laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca /
SA01vakobhau:367_01-03_0: yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:367_04_0: tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi /
