SA01vakobhau:367_09-10_0: yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat /
SA01vakobhau:367_13-14_0: atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:367_17-18_0: tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt /
SA01vakobhau:367_20-21_0: triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum /
SA01vakobhau:368_06-07_0: tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:368_13_0: vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:369_02-03_0: na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:369_12-13_0: "śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata" iti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:369_20-22_0: darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca /
SA01vakobhau:370_05-06_0: yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:370_11-12_0: imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:370_13-14_0: yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:370_16-17_0: na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:370_18-19_0: ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ "sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat /
SA01vakobhau:370_19-20_0: yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:371_02-03_0: "eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapī"ti sūtrāt /
SA01vakobhau:371_09-10_0: samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti /
SA01vakobhau:371_10-11_0: kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau "pravarttitaṃ dharmacakrami"ti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:371_12-13_0: tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:371_13-14_0: ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:371_15-16_0: ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:371_16-17_0: yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:371_17-18_0: tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:372_05_0: antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:372_08-09_0: na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:372_09_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti /
SA01vakobhau:372_12_0: rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante /
SA01vakobhau:372_12-13_0: na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum /
SA01vakobhau:372_13-14_0: āgamo 'pyayaṃ "pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:372_19-20_0: sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti /
SA01vakobhau:373_03_0: eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā /
SA01vakobhau:373_11-12_0: kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:373_15_0: kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt /
SA01vakobhau:373_19-20_0: tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā /
SA01vakobhau:373_21-01_0: sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena /
SA01vakobhau:374_04-05_0: nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati /
SA01vakobhau:374_06-08_0: yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca /
SA01vakobhau:374_11-12_0: na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:374_15_0: yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:374_16_0: śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt /
SA01vakobhau:374_17-18_0: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:374_19_0: evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:374_21-22_0: evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:374_22-23_0: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:374_23-24_0: anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:374_25_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:375_04-06_0: bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:375_06-07_0: asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi /
SA01vakobhau:375_07-08_0: tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:375_09-10_0: api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā /
SA01vakobhau:375_10-12_0: na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:375_18_0: tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmī"ti coktam /
SA01vakobhau:375_20-21_0: maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:375_23-24_0: yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:376_02-03_0: tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete /
SA01vakobhau:376_03-04_0: sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:376_04_0: utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:376_05-07_0: āyuṣmānbhautikaḥ śaikṣībhūtaḥ sāmayikyā vimukteratyāsvādanānmṛdvindriyatvāccabhīkṣṇaṃ parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca /
SA01vakobhau:376_09-10_0: yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt /
SA01vakobhau:376_17-18_0: kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra" iti /
SA01vakobhau:376_19-21_0: yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:376_21-22_0: atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:376_23-25_0: yatredamuktaṃ "tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:377_03-04_0: yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:377_07_0: kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:377_13-16_0: yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ "ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_6.59_0: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā //
SA01vakobhau:378_07_0: naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:378_07-09_0: "dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:378_15-16_0: akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:378_18_0: tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:379_07_0: kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati /
SA01vakobhau:379_14-15_0: indriyāṇi hi saṃcaran phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyagotrakaṃ phalamārgameva pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_6.62_0: dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ //
SA01vakobhau:380_01-02_0: akopyadharmā ca dvividha uttāpanāgata āditaśca tadgotraḥ akopyabheda eva /
SA01vakobhau:380_04-05_0: śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī śraddhādhimukto dṛṣṭioprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimukta ubhayatovimuktaśca /
SA01vakobhau:380_21-22_0: indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca /
SA01vakobhau:381_06-07_0: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā "kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:381_13_0: samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena /
SA01vakobhau:381_15-16_0: phalena tvaparipūrṇasyāśaikṣatvameva nāstīti nāsya punaḥ phalena paripūrṇaparipūrṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:381_19-20_0: vahava ime mārgabhedā uktā laukikalokokttaradarśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣamārgāḥ prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgā iti /
SA01vakobhau:382_03-04_0: eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt /
SA01vakobhau:382_11-12_0: caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:382_14-16_0: anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti /
SA01vakobhau:382_18-19_0: mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi /
SA01vakobhau:383_09_0: śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /
SA01vakobhau:383_14-17_0: prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhādhā hi smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ ata indriyāṇi tāvadvalāni ca nāmagrāhikayā śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñādravyāṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagṛṣṭiśca prajñaiva /
SA01vakobhau:383_20-21_0: tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:384_08-09_0: "ṛddhim ca vo bhikṣavo darśayiṣyāmi ṛddhipādāṃśaca yāvadṛddhiḥ katamā /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_6.70_1: bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam //
SA01vakobhau:384_23-25_0: tatra dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:384_26-02_0: "ādita eva tāvadvahuvidhaviṣapavyāsekavisāriṇīnāṃ buddhīnāṃ nigrahārya smṛtyupasthānāni cetasa upanibaddhāni bhavanti yāvadeva gardhāśritānāṃ smarasaṃkalpānāṃ prativinodanāye"ti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:385_06-07_0: tathā hyuktam "āryāṣṭāṅge khalu mārge bhāvanāparipūri gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:385_07-08_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti yāvat sapta bodhyaṅgānī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:385_08-10_0: punaścoktaṃ "yathābhūtavacanārocanamiti bhikṣavaścaturṇāmāryasatyānāmetadadhivacanaṃ yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇamiti bhikṣo āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyaitadadhivacanami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:385_12-13_0: kati bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sāsravā iti katyanāsravā iti /
SA01vakobhau:386_08-09_0: ārupyesu samyagvākkarmāntājīvaiḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ ca varjitā dvātriṃśat /
SA01vakobhau:386_15-16_0: duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyānyabhisamayan dharme cāvetyaprasādamāryakāntāni ca śīlāni pratilabhate /
SA01vakobhau:386_16-17_0: mārgasatyamabhisamayan buddhe tasya ca śrāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhete /
SA01vakobhau:386_17-18_0: yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:387_06-07_0: buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:387_11-12_0: samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:387_14-15_0: sūtra ukta"maṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:387_15-16_0: kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam /
SA01vakobhau:387_19-20_0: binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:387_20-21_0: aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam /
SA01vakobhau:388_09_0: saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte /
SA01vakobhau:388_11-13_0: iha bhikṣavo rāgāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ dveṣānmohāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktamityaparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye paripūrṇasya cānugrahāya cchandovīryami"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:388_18_0: yaiva hi pūrvaṃ bodhiruktā saiveha samyagjñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:389_02-03_0: vajropame hi samādho sa ca prahīyate /
SA01vakobhau:389_06-07_0: nanu cāmuktasyāpi śaikṣasya laukikamutpadyate na tattādṛśam /
SA01vakobhau:389_11-12_0: yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiruktā ye ca trayodhātava ucyante prahāṇadhāturviṃrāgadhātunirodhadhāturiti /
SA01vakobhau:389_21_0: yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā /
SA01vakobhau:390_11-12_0: tatra vītarāgaḥ satyāni paśyandharmajñānakṣāntibhiḥ kleśānna prajahāti /
SA01vakobhau:390_14-15_0: abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti
SA01vakobhau:391_02_0: kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:391_03_0: kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:391_05-06_0: dṛṣṭayastu tā santiraṇātmakattvāt yathā ca kṣāntayo dṛṣṭirna jñānamevaṃ punaḥ
SA01vakobhau:391_14-15_0: eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñādṛṣṭiḥ anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:392_14_0: te eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne satyabhedena punaścatvāri jñānāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:392_18-19_0: ete eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne caturvidhe adṛṣṭisvabhāve kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ cocyate /
SA01vakobhau:393_17-18_0: tatra paracittajñānena darjñanamārga jñātukāmaḥ prayogaṃ kṛtvā prathamau
SA01vakobhau:393_21_0: śrāvako darśanamārgāt paracittajñānena dvau kṣaṇau jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:393_22-01_0: yāvacca sa tatra prayogamāra mate tāvadayaṃ ṣoḍaśacittamanuprāpto bhavatītyantarā na jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:394_02_0: prathamau ca dvāvaṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānaṃ mṛduprayogatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:394_08-09_0: samudayaḥ prahīṇo nirodhaḥ sākṣātakṛto mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:394_09-10_0: tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam /
SA01vakobhau:394_11-12_0: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti /
SA01vakobhau:394_16-18_0: ityetāni daśa jñānāni bhavanti yaduta dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayañṇyānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:394_16-26_0: kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante /
SA01vakobhau:395_06_2: na hi tena caittā na jñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:396_01-02_0: duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga jñānāni svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiḥ pravartanta ityekaikaṃ caturākāraṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:396_07_0: sāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ jñeyānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yat svalakṣaṇam tadākārayati /
SA01vakobhau:396_10-11_0: yadā cittaṃ gṛhlāti na tadā cittānāṃ yadā vedanāṃ na tadā saṃjñāmityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:396_11-12_0: yattarhi bhagavatīktam "sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī"tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:396_13-14_0: tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgam /
SA01vakobhau:396_14-15_0: atra tu sūtre rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣī vigatarāgamityeke /
SA01vakobhau:396_15-16_0: yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syādanyakleśasamprayuktamapi syāt /
SA01vakobhau:396_16-17_0: evaṃ tarhi tadapratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ cittamakliṣṭaṃ naiva sarāgaṃ na vigatarāgaṃ syādityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:396_21_1: tadeva hi cittaṃ saṃkṣiptavikṣiptaṃ syāt kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayīgāt /
SA01vakobhau:396_22-23_0: tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānāni dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ mārgajñānami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:397_03-04_0: kliṣṭaṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanā 'bhāvānna mahāparivāraṃ tribhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /
SA01vakobhau:397_04-05_0: kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /
SA01vakobhau:397_06_0: ekayā hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā daśānuśayātyantasamudghātaḥ kriyate /
SA01vakobhau:397_10-11_0: bhāvitaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhāvitatvāt vimuktaṃ kliṣṭaṃ svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyāmavimuktatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:397_13_0: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:397_14-15_0: yaccittam styānamiddhasahagatamadhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagataṃ no tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam /
SA01vakobhau:397_16-17_0: nanu coktaṃ tadeva cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ syādvikṣiptaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:397_22-23_0: ityapyetat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnamiti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:397_24-25_0: yadi ca sūtre tadeva līnaṃ cittaṃ tadevoddhatamityabhipretaṃ syāt idaṃ noktaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:397_25-27_0: "yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye prasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:397_27-28_0: yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:398_01_0: manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā na saṃmukhībhāva ityadoṣa eṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:398_02-03_0: tayostu sahabhāvāttadeva cittaṃ līnaṃ tadevoddhatamiti brūmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:398_08-09_0: na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālambanaṃ nāpi taccittālambanaṃ rāgālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:398_10-11_0: rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamasaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgamiti sūtrābhigrāyo dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:398_11-12_0: yat tūktaṃ "vigatarāgamasya taccittaṃ bhavati vigatadveṣaṃ vigatamohamanāvarttikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārupyabhave" iti /
SA01vakobhau:398_13-14_0: nanu coktam anyakleśasaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ rāgaviprayuktatvādvigatarāgaṃ syādi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:398_17-19_0: na gṛhlāti ākāralambananirapekṣaṃṃ hi tadraktamidaṃ cittamiti jānāti natvamuṣmin rupe raktamiti jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:398_19-20_0: anyathā hi tadrūpālambanamapi syāt tadālambanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhlataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:398_20-22_0: sarvaṃ ca paracittajñānaṃ dravyasvalakṣaṇacittacaittapratyutpannaparasaṃtatikāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāpratisaṃyuktaviṣayaṃ darśanamārgapratiṣiddhaṃ bhāvanāmārga upalabhyate /
SA01vakobhau:398_22-23_0: śūnyatā 'nimittasamādhi viprayuktaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānāsaṃgṛhītamānantaryamārga pratiṣiddhaṃ ca vedittavyam /
SA01vakobhau:399_02_0: kṣayānutpādajñāne śeṣe te caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmakārau varjayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:399_02-04_0: pāramārthikayorapi saṃvṛtibhajanāt śīṇā me jātirnāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti tadvalānuvyavahārataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:399_11_0: anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:399_12-14_0: nāsyāyamartho yadastyetatsthānamastyetadvastvityevaṃ vijānīyāditi api tvastyetat sthānamastyetadvastu yadanityādito vijānīyāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:399_16-18_0: ātmata ātmīyata ucchedataḥ śāśvatataḥ ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādato 'grataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:399_21_0: kiṃ punarime ṣoḍaśākārā nāmata āhosvit dravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:400_24-26_0: kṣetrādivaśena hi phalasya gandharasavīryavipākaprabhāvabhedā bhavanti caturthaḥ prabhavastataḥ eva tatsaṃbhavāt phalasyeva puṣpāvasānamiti /
SA01vakobhau:400_26-01_0: tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:401_01-02_0: "asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā 'smīti sadasmīti asadasmīti /
SA01vakobhau:401_02-03_0: bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi /
SA01vakobhau:401_04-05_0: syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:401_06-07_0: "iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami"ti vacanāta /
SA01vakobhau:401_10_0: "eṣa mārgo hi nāstyanyo darśanasya viśuddhaya" iti
SA01vakobhau:401_15-16_0: punaḥ punaḥ parihāṇito nātyantiko mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ niḥsaraṇākāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:401_16-17_0: nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti /
SA01vakobhau:401_20_0: evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:402_01_0: prajñā cānye ca sarve sālambanā dharmā ākārayanti /
SA01vakobhau:402_03-04_0: tadevaṃ kṛtvā siddhaṃ bhavati prajñā ākāraścākārayati cākāryante ca /
SA01vakobhau:402_15_0: anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca /
SA01vakobhau:402_18_0: bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu /
SA01vakobhau:404_12_0: traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā /
SA01vakobhau:404_14-15_0: ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti /
SA01vakobhau:404_15-16_0: tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:405_02-03_0: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
SA01vakobhau:405_04-05_0: tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam /
SA01vakobhau:405_14_0: ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā /
SA01vakobhau:405_15-16_0: samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:406_01-02_0: darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:406_05-06_0: tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu /
SA01vakobhau:406_10-12_0: kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate /
SA01vakobhau:406_12-13_0: samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam /
SA01vakobhau:406_14-15_0: mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:406_19-20_0: alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate /
SA01vakobhau:406_21-22_0: evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:406_22-24_0: lokottaramārga-sāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:406_24-01_0: eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yat-tat-saṃmukhībhāva-samarthāśrayalābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:407_01_0: gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:407_04_0: yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate /
SA01vakobhau:407_06_0: evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:407_09_0: nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:407_09-10_0: ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti /
SA01vakobhau:407_19-20_0: avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne /
SA01vakobhau:408_04-05_0: ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:408_11-13_0: tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante tānyeva /
SA01vakobhau:408_16-17_0: saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:408_21-23_0: śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya /
SA01vakobhau:409_02-03_0: vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:409_12_0: yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:409_15_0: yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:409_17-19_0: kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:409_20-21_0: aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā /
SA01vakobhau:409_23-01_0: pṛthagjanasya tu kāmatridhyānavairāgyāntyavimuktimārgeṣu dhyānabhūmikeṣu ca prayogābhijñātrayavimuktimārgāpramāṇādiguṇābhinirhāreṣu saṃvṛtijñānamanāgataṃ bhāvyate paracittajñānaṃ cānyatra nirvedhabhāgīyebhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:410_03-04_0: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate /
SA01vakobhau:410_04-05_0: anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:410_07-09_0: yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:410_11-13_0: kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a4ubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānāpramāṇavimokṣādayaḥ rajjucchedāducchvasantīva peḍāsādharmyeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:410_18_0: kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:411_05-06_0: "ṣaḍigānīndriyāṇi sudāntāni yāvatsubhāvitāni tathā santyasminkāye kleśā" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:411_10_0: ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:411_11_0: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca /
SA01vakobhau:412_08-09_0: atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni /
SA01vakobhau:412_19_0: yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam /
SA01vakobhau:413_01-02_0: sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:413_14-15_0: prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare /
SA01vakobhau:413_18_0: taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva /
SA01vakobhau:414_03-04_0: yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:414_04_0: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam /
SA01vakobhau:414_05-06_0: yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam /
SA01vakobhau:414_06-07_0: yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:414_12-13_0: yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā /
SA01vakobhau:414_14-16_0: athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:414_19-20_0: anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā /
SA01vakobhau:415_11_0: kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:415_17-19_0: etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:416_01-02_0: sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat /
SA01vakobhau:416_07-08_0: tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:416_09-10_0: atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam /
SA01vakobhau:416_10-11_0: paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam /
SA01vakobhau:416_11-13_0: te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante /
SA01vakobhau:417_02-04_0: tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ sarvathā 'pi raṇaṃ notpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:417_04-05_0: na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā /
SA01vakobhau:417_11-12_0: anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti /
SA01vakobhau:417_16-17_0: anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:417_17-18_0: avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:418_01_0: tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:418_05-06_0: praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:419_03_0: sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt /
SA01vakobhau:419_10-11_0: anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:419_17-19_0: "padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida" ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:419_20-21_0: āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:420_02_0: yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:420_10-11_0: niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā /
SA01vakobhau:420_17-18_0: pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam /
SA01vakobhau:422_06-07_0: kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:422_07-09_0: pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti /
SA01vakobhau:422_16_0: yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:422_17-18_0: evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhau:422_19-20_0: ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:422_23_0: janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:423_06-07_0: kathaṃ tarhi "cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ" ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_7.46_0: iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ //
SA01vakobhau:424_18-19_0: asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti /
SA01vakobhau:424_19-01_0: na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt /
SA01vakobhau:425_01-03_0: pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:425_10_0: śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:425_12_0: manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:425_13_0: ata e"vācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya" ityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:426_05-06_0: kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātau-ityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam /
SA01vakobhau:426_06-07_0: kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:426_14-15_0: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni /
SA01vakobhau:427_04_0: nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat /
SA01vakobhau:427_04-05_0: na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti /
SA01vakobhau:427_10-11_0: kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:427_14-15_0: yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante /
SA01vakobhau:427_17_0: ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta" iti gāthā /
SA01vakobhau:427_18_0: buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante /
SA01vakobhau:427_18-19_0: yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti /
SA01vakobhau:428_11-12_0: jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:428_17-18_0: upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām /
SA01vakobhau:429_04-05_0: kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye /
SA01vakobhau:429_09-11_0: dhyānasamāpannasya śabdālokābhogaprayogeṇa dhyānabhūmikāni bhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādau nirvartete cakṣuḥśrotrasāmantake rūpaśabdyordarśanaśravaṇahetū iti dhyānabhūmikatvāt divye eva te cakṣuḥśrotre /
SA01vakobhau:429_13-14_0: nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:430_02_0: sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:430_15-16_0: yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:432_03-04_0: asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:432_19_0: evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:433_01_1: yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:433_02-03_0: nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:433_03-04_0: yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:433_06-07_0: tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare /
SA01vakobhau:433_11-12_0: sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi /
SA01vakobhau:433_15_0: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham /
SA01vakobhau:433_22-23_0: vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti /
SA01vakobhau:434_13_0: na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:434_13-14_0: yaduktaṃ "catuskandhā" iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:434_15-16_0: yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:434_22-25_0: āyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanānnaḍakalāpīdvayavannāmarūpayoranyonyaniśritavacanā "dvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpami"ti vacanāt anyatrarūpādyāvatsaṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatigatipratiṣedhāccārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhiriti cet /
SA01vakobhau:434_26-01_0: yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:435_01-02_0: yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti /
SA01vakobhau:435_03-04_0: kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti /
SA01vakobhau:435_05_0: bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:435_07-08_0: "atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāni"ti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:435_10-11_0: "arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramādi"ti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:435_11_0: sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti /
SA01vakobhau:435_15-16_0: bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca /
SA01vakobhau:435_16-17_0: dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā "yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:435_17-18_0: ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ "yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ ve"ti /
SA01vakobhau:435_18-19_0: satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:436_05-06_0: anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam /
SA01vakobhau:436_08-09_0: na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti /
SA01vakobhau:436_09-10_0: "yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti /
SA01vakobhau:436_11_0: kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:436_13-14_0: ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti /
SA01vakobhau:437_13-14_0: eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:437_18-19_0: vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:437_19-20_0: yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam /
SA01vakobhau:438_04_0: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:438_16_0: ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01vakobhau:438_22-23_0: iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat /
SA01vakobhau:438_26_0: na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi /
SA01vakobhau:439_01-02_0: nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu /
SA01vakobhau:439_03-04_0: yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:439_05-06_0: "sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata" iti svaśabdena vacanācca /
SA01vakobhau:439_09-11_0: "yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatī"tyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham /
SA01vakobhau:439_21_0: na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:439_21-22_0: ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:439_24-25_0: tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:439_25-01_0: ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:440_03-04_0: naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam /
SA01vakobhau:440_06-07_0: sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti /
SA01vakobhau:440_07-08_0: na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:440_15_0: yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti /
SA01vakobhau:440_15-16_0: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:440_18-19_0: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā "atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:440_19-20_0: caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata" ityuktam /
SA01vakobhau:440_20-21_0: punaścoktaṃ "sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādi"tyato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti /
SA01vakobhau:441_01-02_0: kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:441_02_0: na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate /
SA01vakobhau:441_11-12_0: trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_8.11_0: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam //
SA01vakobhau:441_20_0: taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu /
SA01vakobhau:442_07-08_0: yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:442_12-13_0: prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:442_16-17_0: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:442_23-24_0: śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam /
SA01vakobhau:442_24-01_0: ata evocyate "syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt /
SA01vakobhau:443_08_0: nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate /
SA01vakobhau:443_18-19_0: svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti /
SA01vakobhau:444_01-02_0: śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete /
SA01vakobhau:444_03_0: vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante /
SA01vakobhau:444_12_0: kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate /
SA01vakobhau:444_14-15_0: pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti /
SA01vakobhau:444_17-18_0: śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti /
SA01vakobhau:445_05_0: hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam /
SA01vakobhau:445_09-10_0: kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam /
SA01vakobhau:445_12_0: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
SA01vakobhau:446_02-03_0: sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta /
SA01vakobhau:446_04-05_0: evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:446_06-07_0: yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:446_09-10_0: tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:446_10-11_0: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:446_11-12_0: samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:446_17_0: bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau /
SA01vakobhau:446_21_0: nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate /
SA01vakobhau:447_09-10_0: maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:447_20_1: kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā /
SA01vakobhau:448_01-02_0: śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni /
SA01vakobhau:448_04-05_0: ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:448_10-11_0: ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:448_19_0: tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:448_19-20_0: punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:449_01-02_0: tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:449_17_0: paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:449_17-18_0: anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:450_15-16_0: na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:451_08-09_0: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:451_11_0: kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:451_17_0: prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:452_01_0: yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā /
SA01vakobhau:452_04_0: idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante
SA01vakobhau:453_03_0: sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:453_03-05_0: duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:453_05_1: atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:454_05-07_0: yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti /
SA01vakobhau:454_07-08_0: na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:454_09_0: teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe /
SA01vakobhau:454_09-10_0: tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:454_10-11_0: tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate /
SA01vakobhau:454_11-12_0: tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati /
SA01vakobhau:454_13-14_0: śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt /
SA01vakobhau:454_14-16_0: evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate /
SA01vakobhau:454_20_0: kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:455_02-03_0: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:455_16-17_0: kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave /
SA01vakobhau:456_05_0: bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:456_07-08_0: bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa /
SA01vakobhau:456_08-09_0: tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti /
SA01vakobhau:456_14-15_0: ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:456_17-18_0: aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:456_18-19_0: evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:457_02-03_0: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:457_07_0: yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye /
SA01vakobhau:457_09_0: yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe /
SA01vakobhau:458_09-10_0: sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam /
SA01vakobhau:458_17_0: ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_8.38_0: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca //
SA01vakobhau:459_05-06_0: rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle /
SA01vakobhau:459_10_0: tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:459_12-13_0: ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:459_15_0: yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:460_01-02_0: prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:460_02-03_0: saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_8.41_0: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_8.42_0: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:vakk_8.43_1: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ //
SA01vakobhau:461_05-06_0: kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti /
SA01vakobhau:461_06-07_0: ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye /
SA01vakobhau:461_08-09_0: sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya /
SA01vakobhau:461_09-11_0: satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:461_15_0: kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:461_22-23_0: yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:462_01-02_0: na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:462_03_0: evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:462_03-04_0: na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt /
SA01vakobhau:462_07_0: etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:462_07-08_0: loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:462_08-09_0: yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca /
SA01vakobhau:462_10-11_0: yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam /
SA01vakobhau:462_11-12_0: yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:462_12-14_0: atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:462_16_0: na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:462_17-18_0: skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:462_23-24_0: atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:462_25_1: skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:462_26-01_0: yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:463_01-02_0: yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ "pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyami"ti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:463_02-03_0: naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:463_03-04_0: yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam /
SA01vakobhau:463_06_0: pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:463_06-07_0: atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:463_07-08_0: tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā /
SA01vakobhau:463_11-13_0: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā /
SA01vakobhau:463_13-14_0: evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:463_15-17_0: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:463_17_0: evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:463_18-19_0: ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:463_20_0: yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:463_21-22_0: kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti /
SA01vakobhau:463_22-23_0: yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:463_26-27_0: rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:463_27_0: idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate /
SA01vakobhau:464_05-06_0: yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā /
SA01vakobhau:464_08-09_0: kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:464_10-11_0: yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:464_12-13_0: sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:464_14_0: yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti /
SA01vakobhau:464_15-16_0: "ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā" iti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:464_16-17_0: atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:464_20-22_0: "yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:464_22-23_0: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:464_23-24_0: mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:464_26-27_0: ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame /
SA01vakobhau:465_02-03_0: yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:465_03-06_0: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmī"tyuktvā cakṣurabhijñeyaṃ rūpāṇi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yadapi taccakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayamadhyātmamutpadyate veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam /
SA01vakobhau:465_07_0: ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:465_08-09_0: cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:465_11-13_0: "cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate /
SA01vakobhau:465_13-14_0: atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti /
SA01vakobhau:465_14-15_0: atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:465_15-16_0: atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:465_17-18_0: sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
SA01vakobhau:465_20_0: yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:465_21-22_0: teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato "yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce"ti /
SA01vakobhau:465_22-25_0: bimbisārasūtre coktam "ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:466_01-04_0: "manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
SA01vakobhau:466_01-04_3: evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate" // iti /
SA01vakobhau:466_06-07_1: yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati //
SA01vakobhau:466_08-09_1: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ //
SA01vakobhau:466_12-13_1: na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:466_15-16_0: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:466_17_0: na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:466_19_0: yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā /
SA01vakobhau:466_22-24_0: yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram /
SA01vakobhau:466_24_0: kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti "sarvadharmā anātāna" iti /
SA01vakobhau:467_01_1: naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi /
SA01vakobhau:467_02-03_0: iha caivaṃ vikalpyate "anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:467_04_0: anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:467_04-05_0: "nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ" yattāvaduktaṃ prāk "no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no ve"ti tattāvadaśocam /
SA01vakobhau:467_05-07_0: uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare "ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:467_08-10_0: tathoktaṃ "ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:467_11-12_0: yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:467_14_0: yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti /
SA01vakobhau:467_14-15_0: na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:467_15-16_0: evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:467_16-17_0: naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe /
SA01vakobhau:467_17-19_0: yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:467_23-24_0: "ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:467_23-24_1: yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana" iti /
SA01vakobhau:468_01_0: skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:468_02-03_0: "bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ce"ti /
SA01vakobhau:468_03-04_0: na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:468_06-07_0: "yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ" sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:468_07-08_0: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti /

SA01vakobhau:478_04-05_0: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate /
SA01vakobhau:478_05-07_0: evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat /
SA01vakobhau:478_07-09_0: yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti /
SA01vakobhau:478_10-11_0: nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:479_03-04_0: ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhau:479_03-04_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
